text: They can be a bit brash if busy, but they're nice guys and do good work. They're good to deal with and I'd gladly talk my cars back over there.

name: bamaboy2169
text: Wish I could give this place zero stars. I went with my mother to pick her supposedly detailed car. The wheels were still dirty, the carpets were suppose to be vacuumed and shampooed yet there was dirt everywhere, and bugs still on both side mirrors and the sunroof shade cover like they were never even washed!! He sprayed armor all on the plastic on the outside of the vehicle and did not run it in on most parts just left little spray dots everywhere. The dash was still dusty with no armour all on it. He took advantage of my mother charging her sixty five dollars. I told him if it was me I would not be paying you for this terrible job you did. He then went on to tell me to shoot myself!! I would never go there again and I would recommend especially if you re a woman to stay away he ll take advantage of you thinking you won't know what you re looking at. Zero stars wish I could give negative stars....

name: Golden Armstead
text: Great place

name: Sarah Barrett
text: They were amazing and super nice. I did not get the two gentleman's names but they were very helpful and sincere. Thank guys!!

resp.text: Thank you for the fantastic review, Sarah! We love hearing about our wonderful team. They work hard to make sure every person is taken care of and we know they will appreciate seeing your great feedback. Thank you for being an awesome customer. We'd love to thank you directly; please email us at care@carwashusaexpress.com. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Wiliam Kraus
text: Mothers Day and wife and I dropped by to get a wash in Foley (we live in Jonesboro and have a "package" there).  Went to pull in, but system did not read our window sticker to let us in.  Jeffrey Gibson, on site attendant, greeted us immediately and, in a display of excellent customer service and communication, chatted with us and let us through the system.  Got great wash (Jeffrey and his team member thoroughly prewashed front, back, windshield and windows).  Upon our exiting the wash, we could see them waving goodbye.  Great job, team...thx!

resp.text: Thank you for the fantastic review, Wiliam! We love hearing about our wonderful team. They work hard to make sure every person is taken care of and we know they will appreciate seeing your great feedback. Thank you for being an awesome customer. We'd love to thank you directly; please email us at care@carwashusaexpress.com. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Paul Epting
text: Good Wash.  My fast pass didn't work at this location but the mgr still gave me a car wash

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Paul. We're glad to hear that our team managed to help you out. We look forward to your next visit.

name: Karl Stansell
text: Fantastic place to wash your car. Great vacuums.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, Karl! We're glad to know you can depend on us to keep your car looking beautiful and brand-new. That's what we're all about! We'd like to thank you directly; please email us at care@carwashusaexpress.com. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Beth D
text: The 1st time I went was great. This past time, it seemed the thing was faster and it was horrible. I still had dirt all over my car that wasn't touched. I complained until the guy let me run it through again. He told me that they didn't do that for the cheaper 2 car washes and I shouldn't expect a clean car unless I buy the most expensive wash. Geez....won't go back!

resp.text: Thanks for such honest and direct feedback on your wash experience. Our team should always be ready to help and provide the world-class service we're known for. We understand this was a frustrating experience for you. If you contact us directly at care@carwashusaexpress.com or (419) 749-6857 we would like to see how we can make this right with you.

name: Ashton Williams
text: The guys scrubbed my suv almost clean before I even went through the wash! I’ve yet to find a wash that get my rims clean, this is the first one! Super happy.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, Ashton! We're glad to know you can depend on us to keep your car looking beautiful and brand-new. That's what we're all about! We look forward to your next visit!

name: Miguel Negron
text: Employees are lazy and rude..!! Need better management vacuum cleaners and hoses work half of the time.. automatic car wash leave soap all of your car blower doesn't work right.. place has gone downhill..!!😠🤔😢

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback, Miguel. We agree with you; everything should be diligently maintained at our car wash. We would appreciate if you could contact us at care@carwashusaexpress.com or (251) 244-1176, including your name and your review, so we can make it up to you. We hope you visit us again.

name: Rick Berger
text: Rinse cycle wasn't working so the blowers just blew soap everywhere. They would not run it through again and just rinsed with a hose.

name: jojo vanderpool
text: whole bed of my truck was filled with soapy water.  my wifes 4 runner still had soap and the back hatch never got cleaned

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We always want you to feel like your car is getting our best personal attention. We're sorry to hear you left disappointed with your experience. We will share your feedback with the team and continue improving our customer service. Please reach out to our customer care so we can make this right: care@carwashusaexpress.com.

text: Hours say they open at 8am. Waited at gate until 8:07, asked the gentleman inside gate what time they opened he said “little after 8”

resp.text: We're sorry for the inconvenience, Cody. We should definitely be ready to deliver a world-class car wash whenever you visit us during our operating hours. We will investigate these concerns with management to make sure you're always having a hassle-free experience. If you would like to share any more feedback with us, don't hesitate to reach out to us at care@carwashusaexpress.com.

text: Absolutely terrible service. We have been using their services in MS and Clare on vacation this week. Tried to get our car cleaned and the employees couldn’t pull up our information so they turned us away instead of trying to help. Save your money people and go to Bebo’s!!!!!!!!!

text: I've used Bay Wash several times. For $5 you get unlimited time (in 5 minute increments) and all of their soaps and other chemicals (tire cleaning, etc) are effective. Vacuuming is included in the $5 cost. My only issues are: 1) the labeling on the options (wash, rinse, brush etc) are in serious need of replacing, and, 2) it's necessary to push a button for additional time and it will not work until the current 5 minutes have ticked down to zero time left.

text: NEVER EVER GET GAS HERE. They upcharge the gas! What's the most important part of a gas station? The &#@!ing gas. I pulled in because the price was lower than all of the other stations. But only on the sign. I started pumping and things weren't adding up. I literally got out a calculator and my final price was 11 cents more per gallon than what the sign and the pump showed, which means the pumps are broken...or rigged. The cashier didn't know what to do so I had to walk away knowing that I over paid. I guess the BBB will sort this out.

text: Service top notch, alway wash and rinse back have SUV wery well.

name: Devan Hornsby
text: My husband and I have a monthly subscription on each of our vehicles. When we applied it was $10 a month. After 3 months the price rose to $35 without notification of any kind. We kept the membership despite the price jump because the service was really nice. However, beginning last month my husband attempted to take his vehicle after work to get it washed and vacuum etc, and they were closed early. We assumed it was just a fluke; i.e. someone had an emergency and had to leave early. It was not. He went three consecutive days to try and wash his car and they were already closed. The business hours posted online are not their business hours apparently. So, we decided to go take both our cars Sunday morning at 8am when they open. Noone was there. So we waited until 9 thinking that they must be running late. Still noone showed up. That makes 4 Times we have taken our cars without a wash. I reccomend not getting the monthly subscription. If I can ever get them on the phone I will request a refund for the last month for both vehicles since I can't reach them in person.

name: Kyle Adams
text: It's a fine car wash - I signed up for a promotional plan, at the end of the plan the wash had closed prior to me getting to wash. I messaged them the following day to cancel and was told I would be charged the premium wash rate. If they had an easy way to cancel it without contacting them directly I would say that's fair - but due to being difficult to cancel I think the fair thing to do here would be allowing me to cancel it the following day. I understand a business has to make money, but this seems unreasonable.

resp.text: Hi Kyle! Unfortunately, this platform doesn't allow me to post screenshots of our previous conversations (before this specific incident took place) where you cancelled your plan easily with me. When a customer signs up for a plan, our terms and conditions clearly state to cancel your plan 3 days before your anniversary date. We are usually very lenient with this policy and allow customers to cancel the day before, but since you didn't cancel your $1 plan before your card was charged I had to follow our company policy.

name: Tara
text: We jumped ship from the previous carwash we had a membership with after trying a month here! We now have subscriptions for both of our vehicles here and love it. They always do a great job scrubbing the heavy stuff (usually pollen right now) off ahead and I love they have an undercarriage wash too (so great for rinsing salt off from the beaches). They also have separate blowing nozzles with the vacuums to blow dust out of crevices that a vacuum can’t reach and wash station for floor mats.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 stars and kind review, Tara! We appreciate it so much!

name: Tim Vander Have
text: The customer service I received was rivaled only by chic-fil-a. I was helped with my coupon and alerted that my car might not fit on the rail. The were worried about scraping my bumper so they invited me to just vacuum my car.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Tim! We're honored to be in the same customer service realm as the G.O.A.Ts over at Chick-Fil-A.

name: BorgWire
text:
Excellent quality car wash. We purchased a subscription, so are able to drive right into the wash.  The employees clean the tires on the way in, and are there to direct the vehicle into the wash. Vehicle comes out very clean.

There’s a place to clean the floor mats and there are many vacuums, which have good suction.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 stars and great review! We're glad you enjoy the mat cleaning area!

name: Shauna Abel
text: I really wish they would pay more attention to mirrors and front end for bugs. This is twice I've gone through and all bugs are still there. Great vacuum's and detail area.

resp.text: Hi Shauna! We're sorry to hear you weren't 100% satisfied. We'll be sure to pay more attention moving forward.

name: KJ Hornsby
text: Don't get the monthly carwash because they close randomly whenever they feel like it and give you no way of canceling it

resp.text: Hi KJ! My manager has been away on vacation, but your situation should be resolved now. I'll communicate with you via text if there are any other comments or concerns.

name: Rob Malone
text: Great wash and vacuums. Floor mat cleaning area has a pressure washer to pre clean.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Rob! We're glad you like the mat cleaning area! It's the first one we've ever done and it's now going to be a staple at all of our washes.

name: Gene Labrato
text: Meets my needs, vacuum  is functional and a mat cleaning and offers a drying station.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Gene!

resp.text: Hi Chuck! On Sundays we don't open until 10 am. This gives our staff time to attend early worship services if they'd like. Sorry for any confusion!

I promise, I will never pay to use that place. There is a privacy fence between where I wait and car wash. I don't see anything but hear plenty.

name: Landon Johnson
text: Friendly

name: Jesse Roney
text:
The wash is great at a great price point. I don't like the online account settings (I couldn't change my plan), but the guys at the brick and mortar helped me out.
Update 1 week later:
My wife took our car to the wash and the pass wouldn't open the gate. Someone there removed the sticker and replaced it, then proceeded to charge my wife for a new monthly package. I was billed 2 weeks ago and my account is still active. They have now effectively changed me double and created a second account to be billed monthly.

name: Donald Phillips
text: Good car wash fast good vacuums.

name: Patty Davis
text: Like the upgrades.   However last time there paper towels were out and only a few scented tags.

name: Amber Sims
text: The carwash left soap all over my van and when I asked them to rinse the soap off he told me they was to busy to let me go back through for free and wiped it off with a paper towel.The vacuum was good and a nice air freshener.

name: Day B
text: I decided to get the membership package and the three young men were amazing and friendly.  3/19/21 @ 1300.

resp.text: Thank you Day for the great review!

name: Ron “Yogi” Terry
text:
Extremely good service!
Great Car Wash.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Ron!

name: Landen Oneal
text: I love this gas station and its employees!! They are always on it but very friendly and welcoming. I have never had an issue and even if i did i would still continue to be a loyal customer.

resp.text: Hi Landen, thank you for your feedback and for choosing Circle K!

name: Perry Reed
text: Clean efficient and had what i needed with hardly any wait.

resp.text: Hi Perry, thank you for your rating and for choosing Circle K!

name: Callie Stuart
text: I’ve never had my car detailed before so in my opinion it was pretty grimy and worn, but they made it look brand new!! I was honestly so excited when I got my car back, they really paid attention to detail and not a space in the car was left untouched. Every compartment was Vacuumed and cleaned and the scent they used smelt amazing! My cloth seats were disgusting and now they look so so much better. Cameron was very professional and nice and got back to me quickly anytime I had a question. I also had the bronze exterior and the outside of my car looked fantastic to the top rack all the way down to the bottom of my tires. I never thought my car could be so clean, I highly recommend getting your car detailed here.

name: Mel
text: My car had paint overspray all over it in fine speckles, and these guys did an awesome job getting it cleaned up.  The price was much cheaper than quotes I got elsewhere, but the quality of work was exceptional.  They were timely and very professional.  Definitely recommend!

name: E Toner
text: These guys are very professional and pay a lot of attention to detail and quality control. I had my Maserati GTS ceramic coated and the result is outstanding! I will be back and would recommend Down South to anyone and any type of car.

name: John Pearson
text: My 911 turbo is 13 years old and I felt the need to spruce her up.  Had Down South do a color correction and ceramic coating.  Cameron was professional from beginning to end and my 911 looks like a new car, hell, better than a new car.  His rates were almost 1/2 other detailers I spoke to.  Also have a warranty on the coating and a free wash anytime I want it is included.  If I could give 10 stars, I would.

name: Larry Lee
text: super friendly,  great job.  took a few weeks to get in with them but worth the wait

name: Cathy Mitchell
text: Hands down the best service you will get for your car! My car looks brand new when they are finished. Would not go anywhere else.

name: Victoria
text: Down South Detail is over the top. They are professional, flexible with their scheduling and mine, as well as doing an excellent job with their services. They exceeded my expectations by a long shot and got my truck looking like it came right off the show room floor! Thanks again Cameron and Gavin for the amazing work. Will be coming again!

name: Scotty Lewis
text: My white 07 Tundra was in bad shape when I took it in but I left today feeling like a kid.  I’m more than pleased with how clean my truck is.

name: Jared Rispens
text: True professionals. They do great work. Really happy with the ceramic job.

name: Laura C
text: Excellent service!  Thank you Cameron for making my new car look even better!  If you are thinking about calling, don't hesitate!!  Cameron is very professional - he will respond to you quickly and answer any questions that you have.  He does very beautiful work for the price that he has quoted you and it is worth every cent!!

name: Britny Fischer
text: Will recommend every time! Cameron did an AMAZING job getting all the scratches out of my car and made it look like a brand new car. He pays a huge attention to detail and it shows.  Great service and super friendly. Thank you again!

name: Michael Gibney
text:
Cam detailed my 2014 Honda Accord and did a fantastic job. The inside looked like it was new from the factory and the paint looked brand new again. He even got some scratches out of the trunk and driver door.

I would highly recommend Down South Detail to anyone looking for a Car Detail.

name: caleb huber
text: Cameron detailed my 2017 F150 inside & out and did an amazing job! Couldn't find any imperfections, didn't miss a spot. I was able to drop off in the morning and pick back up that afternoon, great work!

name: Michele Colglazier
text: Down South Detail is the best!! From bumper to bumper my Jeep looks brand new. Attention to detail and great customer service. I will definitely use him again and refer all my friends!!

name: Michael Brown
text: Down South detail does some amazing work.  If you love your vehicle and want to take care of it, take it to Cam.  It will be done right.  You will be happy.

name: Dylan Hunn
text: Cameron does great work! He really focuses on the little things that make the biggest difference when detailing a car! He detailed my wife’s 2015 Hyundai Sonata and did an amazing job!

name: Jerimie Gates
text: This guy is a pro. My Jeep and boat were shamefully disgusting. After he was done there were no scratches, the inside miraculously seemed like new again. The most impressive part was how there was no evidence of mold on my boat seats.

name: Michelle J
text: Thanks to Cameron with Down South Detail for making my car look new again! The quality of his work is amazing and it was extremely easy. I went to work, he came to me and while I worked he detailed my car. If you live in Mobile, AL and want your car detailed by someone who uses the best products then this is the guy to call!

resp.text: Thank you for the business!

name: Nathan Weinacker
text: These guys can make a car look better than new! I am extremely impressed with the quality of their work!

name: Lucas Hester
text: I've been attempting to get in touch with this business for just a notch over a month now, to no avail. Their phone number works, voicemail still works, and the website still works, but I can't get them to respond back. I call about twice a week and leave a voicemail at least once each time with my number, plus I've tried their email a couple of times. Nothing. Not sure if something happened and they went under, or they're just that busy. But until something changes, I'm warning people to look elsewhere and not waste their time. They seemed like the best detail crew locally per reviews, but I have no clue what's happened in the past few months. Will edit this if I hear back from them.

name: Colton Cook
text: Great guy that does a fantastic job.

name: Judah Hollis
text: Great prices for a car wash.

name: Detlef Peter
text: Took my black Explorer in for a inside outside clean and wax job. Got the car back and was told everything was done. Car was washed you could see where they missed drying with a towel. That shows me it wasn’t waxed. Also missed doing half the windows on the inside

name: Steven Reynolds
text: Never works right vacuum takes your $ if you want to rinse off thats all u get about 2 minutes

name: Megan Wigginton
text: The change machine has taken my money twice.

name: AHA 1987
text: I always hand wash my vehicles but decided to give a self service car wash a shot for a quick wash which was a complete mistake....scratched my vehicle literally ALL OVER.  Use this car wash with extreme caution.... examine the brush before use. I understand that their are signs on the property about them not being responsible for damages but my biggest complaint is that the owners did not seem to believe me one bit that their brush would scratch my vehicle.

name: RONALD LEVERETT
text: Dollar changer took a dollar and gave no quarters back. Towel machine took .50¢ and no towel.

name: Bryan Dunn
text: Change machine took 5 dollar bill.

name: s r BTEAM
text: No brush nothing works except high pressure rinse everything else broke

name: Kerri Cochran
text: Reliable always.

name: Rolling Meadows Apartments
text: Horrible employees that do not need to be in customer service jobs...

name: Shannon Dean
text: Friendly cashier.

name: Darlene Hartman
text: Get my gas with my rewards card and get faster than a lot of places

name: Randy Pryor
text: Service is always pleasant. Great people.

name: Darrin A Myers
text: Friendly staff, quality fuel and clean restrooms.

name: andrew martin
text: Quick easy trip. Clean bathrooms

name: Rodney Bolden
text: Stopped here to get some gas for my government vehicle. It's a rather typical run of the mill gas station that does not have anything special about it. It does however have a Checkers nearby if you are looking for something to eat before or after you pump your gas.

name: Angela Simmons
text: Got me some boiled peanuts.they were delicious.we filled up an was on our way.

name: Kenyatta Harris
text: They are more expensive than other gas stations

name: Jeff White
text: Great gas

name: Elaine M
text: It's a gas station

name: Mr. Smith
text: Okay for a service station.

name: OG Marley
text: Too expensive

name: April Thorpe
text: Friendly workers

name: Alycia Diehl
text: Has what i need

name: Emma Brooks
text: Steele did a great job making my car shine!

name: Cindy Rodriguez
text: I’ve used their services over the years and have had a great experience each time. I’ve even referred people I know to go and no complaints. My old car looks brand new every time I take it here. The guys are professional and courteous and really know what there doing.

name: Elaine Coston
text: I loved the way my car looked after the job was finished.  The man done a excellent job.

name: Debbie Alexander
text: The car was in very bad shape when I took it in had some tree sap & mold on the top but when I picked it up it looked brand new !!!

name: Erik Lindley
text: $175 for inside and out detailing.  Normally it’s $225, but I opted out on detailing the engine.  They shampooed my seats and did a good job there, but as far as the rest, very poor quality.  Also, good luck trying to reach them on the phone to setup an appointment or inquire about the status.  Luckily one of the workers provided me there cell so I could reach someone.

name: Jason Matheney
text: Amazing job. They have done 2 of my cars now, and I may never wash another car again.

name: jason kirby
text: Sprayed my allow rims with acid and left on too long. Left stains on wheels and rust on my rotors. Still had soap on my car. Not worth it.

name: Latrice bri
text: Purchased a Groupon and upon arrival I was told that they no longer accept them, I advised that I purchased last year before Covid and he said pull over there and I will get you after this vehicle. I waited 45 minutes and asked how much longer and he went on to advise that they he had not received the money from Groupon and was trying to accommodate. I advised that he should contact Groupon and he should have told me up front that he really had no intention of providing the service. I see that the Groupon is still available to be purchased but I would not use this again.

name: Mind Dryft
text:
I don't like giving negative reviews. But this needs to be addressed. I made an appointment at 10 a.m. on a Wednesday. When I arrived, a man told me to come back at 11 so I wouldn't have to wait. When I came back by 11 the female told me it would be finished in 2 hours. I walked back home and walked back giving them three hours. They hadn't even started yet. I told them I would give them a second chance and come back next Wednesday at 10 am. When I arrived the same man told me I was next in line and he would get started right away. He told me to come back in 2 hours. I walked back home and back 3 1/2 hours later and they still hadn't cleaned the seats or vacuumed the floor. My windows are smeared and he said that was the best I would get.

These people are very nice, and courteous. They have a smile on their face when talking to you. I don't have a problem with their attitude. It's their timeliness that is way off and quality since I had to rush them. I gave them three and a half hours instead of two and they still weren't finished. I took my keys and went home. I still payed the 60$ and he refunded me 10 but in all honesty, to keep from having a negative review like this, it should have been free with an apology.

name: Eric Seals
text: Made an appointment with the business, and from the first conversation to the time I dropped my car off and then from them delivering it back to me; totally impressed and satisfied. I can not explain how bad my car was, and how good that got everything looking, reading some of these reviews, I can believe that most of the negative ones probably didn't want to let the tlc be done, so glad that I did! I brought my wife's car in a week later, and totally ruined by the kids, and they made it look as good as any body!! Got a repeat customer out of me for now on!!!

name: Karen Stokes
text: GREEEAT SERVICE!! I had so much pet hair inside of my car and the smell was horrible; however, took it here and I was so pleased with the good job they did!! The guys were so nice and friendly with me, and even though, I felt bad about how my car looked, they made me feel good about bringing it to them. Definitely go to this place of business if you need a good cleaning...

name: Susan Christan
text: These guys know how to clean a car, and they are so sweet and very kind! They made me feel right at home and took very good care of my car.

name: LUIS RODRIGUEZ
text: Awesome services! Great quality! I will definitely be back! Customer service is really good...

name: debbie ash
text: They did a really good job.  If you dont have time to wait drop it off because you'll be waiting a long time.   I'm not saying it in a bad way they are just on point

name: Evan Maltass
text:
Gave them 2 chances. An appointment at 10. Told it'd take 2 hours. 3.5 hours later, they hadn't started. Second time, same thing.

If they tell you 1 hour, it'll be 3. 2 hours is more like 5.

name: DrayPullz
text: It really is sad because I believe in opportunities and chances. However I feel after them washing 2 of my cars, and me spending $225 and even more in the past, that they just don't do a great job. I almost feel as though I have to clean my car before I even take it to them for it to look good. When I received my avenger recently it wasn't waxed well, and the rims still had brake dust on them in spots. For $225, I feel it should have been MUCH better. They also didn't even vacuum my trunk!

name: Northern Steeleiii
text: I made my appointment yesterday, SO GLAD I DID!!! I was totally impressed by the friendliness and the quality of service they did on my vehicle... I will be back!

name: Christopher Coggins
text:
You pay up front which is the wrong way to conduct business cause they already have your money and the product should be
driven by the payment of services rendered. I was told 2-3 hours and it would be ready and here I am at 5 hours and still waiting. I wouldn't recommend this place to anyone , they don't seem very professional and if their attitude is any indication of services rendered I'm sure I won't be happy with the results. NEVER going there again and will never recommend to anyone . I called several times to check on my vehicle and never once got an answer. It should never take this long, I have personally detailed inside and out in a 5 hour window

name: Jeff Saltsman
text: Do not take your car to this place! Its not professional. I had to sign a waiver just to get my car washed. I was there 3 hours for a $35 dollars wash. Being they wanted me to paid first I couldn't just leave. And to top it all off, the wash job was  just plain horrible. My windows were cleaner before went in there. They must have tried to clean my windows with a nasty, dirty rag. By the time I got home, the tire dressing was slung all over my car.  I was so mad! I will NEVER go back to that place.

name: Lee Reese
text: Only place in Moody to get a hand wash and vacuum. Full detailing service available too.

name: Lem Motlow
text: I made appt for 9 am this past Saturday for VIP package had taken vehicle 3 years ago for same thing and all was great this time came and checked at 5pm due to thought they closed at 5 and hadn’t heard from them and they had just started on the inside/ interior, the car hadn’t touched all day long, told me they would call me and that they had to then clean engine and clay bar wax, finally got vehicle at 805pm, dark so couldn’t inspect vehicle that great next morning the outside still had dirt on each door like not washed or wax in area, I will say the interior looked good , however I will never take another vehicle to this place, guy told me he was alone because owner had issue and that tried to call me phone never rang and they had my number on two different calendars appt page and on sign in, very disappointed

name: Trace Atchison
text: The experience was less than average. I went in at 9:05am with only one person in front of me. About 30 mins later another person came in, they had there car ready in about 30 minutes. Completely skipped my car, and the persons care who was here before me. I got the BASIC package. Wash outside and inside. I've been here almost 2 HOURS and they still AREN'T done with my truck. I've seen about 4 employees working today, haven't seen but 1 actually wiping a car, the others I guess are chilling in the back. If they gave me a hose and a rag I could have done it in a quarter of the time. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME HERE

name: Nicole Hayes
text: We got a quote and were told to be there at 9am. Finally left at 9:20 after no one showed up. Not a good way to run your business.

name: Stephonia Taylor Mclinn
text: Fantastic woman on detail car cleaning service and other businesses please make sure to go by there and check them out

name: Katilyn Lankford
text:
Do not take your vehicle here. They not only stole 1 but two of my hydro flash while my car was there. I ended up leaving my car there for 3 hours while I went to work and there was no other customers when I returned the insides were only half way cleaned and the vehicle was not even washed. On top of that they had to pull my brand new mats out of the garbage where they threw then away. Even after waiting for another 40 minutes my car was streaked. My mats were dirty and my mirrors/ glass still dirty.

They were washing the cars with a rag and hardly no soap... no real cleaning agent. So I repeat save your 45 dollars and do it yourself. You'll be a lot happier

name: Brenda Reid
text: Hand wash your vehicle.  They have a good selection of how much detailing you want.   Will pick up and deliver your vehicle.  They do a nice job.

name: Brian Lindsey
text: This place does amazing work and Luis the owner is very polite and he and his staff goes above and beyond for all his customers!!!  Keep up the good work guys!!! Go see Luis at Detail Your Way for all your detailing needs!!!!!!!!!!

name: danny jackson
text: When is this place ever open. I guess I've been by here about 4 times when no is here or they have no keys to open. They do an ok job just have none close by other than these guys.

name: Susan Suttle
text: They do great work! Highly recommend.

name: Febra McGuire
text: Excellent 👌 service

name: Adam Gann
text: I've been here twice in two years and both times the experience was horrible.  Last year they washed my truck (a lifted one at that) and they didn't even wash the fender wells.  In April my wife dropped my new truck off to be washed.  I went by to pick it up that afternoon.  When I got it home, I walked around it.  There were spots 2 feet long that weren't even washed, the bottom of the tailgate was dirty, my mirrors were not clean, the front windshield had water spots baked onto it and the dash was still dusty.  I turned right around and went back.  A "supervisor" came out with the kid who washed it.  He looked at him and said "you missed a lot".  They proceeded to go back over the truck and clean it up.  I told them to make sure the front side of the mirrors were clean.  I noticed what looked like steel wool laying on the table next to where they were washing.  Didn't think much about it, but when I got home and looked at my truck again, my drivers side mirror looked like they had used the steel wool to try and get the bugs, etc. off the mirror.  I called to speak to the owner and he won't call me.  I sent them a message on Facebook asking for the owner to call me.  I was read, but no one ever called.  I guess I'll have to take the truck and attempt to have the mirror buffed out or repainted, at my cost.  This carwash is garbage and the ownership is pathetic.  Wouldn't hurt my feelings if it goes under tomorrow.  I should have learned my lesson after last year.

name: Don Sellers
text: I let them pressure wash my house they done an excellent job very polite very clean would use them again

name: robert2002bmw
text: Nice people but car was not washed good. When I picked it up there was still spots of wax on it.

name: Foster Oliver
text: I have taken my cars here several times.  They have always good a great job!

name: Dave Karr
text: Used a brush to wash my black car. Now my car has swirl marks all over it. This is not a "hand wash".

name: Rebecca Strain
text: Great service!

name: Scott Suttle
text: Great people

name: Sheila Carter
text: Good service

name: Nicole Pearl
text: Demetrius got my ride looking so fresh!! Came to my house and was done so quickly, such quality work, I will definitely be a frequent customer!

name: Andy B
text: Results were great and good price for hand wash, detail, and dry.

name: Willie Lemons
text: I'm visiting the area and needed some detail work. I googled Detail Shops, reviewed, and liked D and D comments and called. I felt very comfortable with the conversation, made a same day appointment and dropped off  my vehicle for a full service detail. When I picked up my vehicle, I was pleasantly pleased with results.

name: Mark Berry
text: My wife liked the job they did on her car..so she went back again.

name: Willard Sitz
text: Super fast, got my vehicle in shape and my cell reception (AT&T) was maxed out which helped pass the time!

name: Alex Estrada
text: Brought my Maserati in for a quick wash. I'm visiting in from out of town.  Big "D" and Little "D" took good care of my car and me. Great guys and outstanding quality of work. I recommend highly!

name: Felecia Walker
text:
Thank u Demetrius darling
Always a pleasure & u keeps me satisfied ❤️❤️❤️

name: Kimberly Sabel
text: I used to go to Madison Car Wash for car detailing, but they recently closed. I found D&D on Google and decided to give them a go. My car looks amazing! We are having a baby next month, and I wanted to get all of the dog fur and dust out of my car in preparation. They did a great job, and my dog sheds a lot, so it was no easy feat. The outside of my car was so shiny, and they even polished the tires. At 9 months pregnant, I was also very grateful for the clean restroom. I highly recommend this operation. The employees were very polite and did a thorough job. I have found my new car detailing place!

name: Shamar Hampton Sr.
text: MAN WHEN I TELL YOU THEY PUT ME BACK IN THE GAME! YOU HEAR ME! INSIDE & OUT LOOKS D GOOD!

name: Tink Legend
text: My car was a complete mess. I even felt bad. They brought her back to life!

name: Nick Watson
text: The team of guys did an excellent job on my car's interior! It looks like I just bought it again! Quick work, very affordable, quality job!

name: Vince Thomas
text: These guys do a great job cleaning our vehicles!!

name: Yo Bro
text: Guy is disrespectful and not business man , will never use his service again

name: Bridgette Moore
text: Great service, friendly staff, my car and seats were really amess and the guys cleaned it up really well. Prices are reasonable. I will be back!

name: Tiffany Belser-Temple
text: Great customer service and fast handwash

name: Carl Underwood
text: This is one of the best if not the best hand carwash in Montgomery

name: Andrew Skier
text: Stopped in because I was nearby with an hour to kill. This place is professionally run and made my car look great.

name: Patrick Carter
text: They did an awesome job on my camper and priced right!

name: TCWOODCRE8TION
text: Good friendly people

name: Tez Dean
text: Great job

name: Chad Lemmers
text: Very small cash-based operation but they cleaned the heck out of my car

name: Joey Harrison
text: Website needs prices!

name: Courtney Gibson
text: Excellent service!

name: Yolanda W.
text: Awesome customer service and my vehicles always sparkle like new! Demetrius is a blessing

name: Tracey Sutherlin
text: The mechanics there are experts; and professional"there is a difference". Prices are fair and my vehicle was ready at the time said.

name: Joseph Townsend
text: Great business to spend your funds, value, thumbs up!

name: Shannon Powell
text: Wendy and Shane are the best team in the mechanics shop! Shane will fix your vehicle, and Wendy has your bill ready for you when he’s finished. Love these guys!

name: Mike Moore
text: Made an appt for 8:00am for a Oil change the day before and har asked if they could have me out by 8:30 because I had a 9:00 appt. they assured me they could. As promised I was pulling out at 8:25am. No BS or up-selling you get from most garages. Refreshingly professional and friendly. I will definitely start bring all business to them. If you want to support small business I would highly recommend trying them out.

name: john frye
text: This is the only place my family uses for car detailing or repair. The staff there is amazing! They stand behind their work! They are a one stop shop for most needs detailing- oil changes - car repair- and if they can’t do it they know people that can! Locally owned - take your car there you won’t be disappointed!

name: Camden Layton
text: If you have never been to a detail shop these are the right people to see they are very honest people and do a great job. The mechanic is also a very honest and fair person. I highly recommend this place

name: Kendoru Kari
text: Cost $250 for incomplete detailing... Vehicle was still filthy in some areas, inside and out, and carpet was pulled up, twisted and put back incorrectly after it was cleaned. The carpet was also ripped during cleaning, which they tried to say it came in that way.. Find somewhere else before here, won't help resolve issues same day..

name: SumYun Guy
text: This place is great. My car was (ashamedly) filthy when I brought it in. When I picked it up it looked and smelled brand new. And it's an '06. They go the extra mile. I definitely recommend this place.

name: River Lotus
text: Horribly rude and did a poor job on detailing. Paid $225 to have complete detail and car seats were not cleaned, sticky still in cup holders, outside of car not buffed as told they would be. When we brought the car back we were treated very poorly and told they can't do anything about it.

name: Margo Bickham
text: I always used this business for all my auto repairs,oil change,tires and other. ASE certified and exceptional customer service.

name: Cody Macon
text: 250$ wasted!! Very disappointed with the outcome. Not worth the money at all!  They do not take pride in their work. Job was half-assed if not less! They made it sound very convincing over the phone, nothing stated over the phone was accomplished. Came out with more scratches than went in!! Only reason it's not a 1 star, is because they tried to compensate for the job but I wasn't satstifed! Would of rather them do their job correctly!!

name: David Griffin
text: What a joke! I called beforehand,  I stopped by there spoke to the owner about my truck having some overspray on it and he said it would be $650 and that he would have to triple buff the entire truck and then wax it for an additional $275. I advised him that I could simply clay bar it in 30 minutes for $25 kit of clay bar. He said ok see ya later... Lol! Didnt want to clay bar the truck for me when I asked if he would just do that,  lol.  Btw my truck is a brand new silverado. Now that's service lmao...Never will I recommend this place. I just finished detailing it myself completely inside and out in 1 hour for 25 bucks. Stay away far away people.

name: Meredith Frye
text: Absolute best experience- over and over again. This is a business who sometimes calls a few days later to make sure you’re happy. We had the pleasure of talking with Marcus when we picked up, and if you ge the chance, you won’t regret it. He’s a business owner who truly cares about his customers.

name: Mary Velasquez
text: They did an amazing mini detail on my Toyota Tacoma--it looked brand new!

name: Jessie L
text:
I am totally satisfied with their service!!! I have honda accord and paid $200 for full exterior/interior service with car seat cleaning because I had a stinky situation with my passenger car seat so I tried to clean it myself but the seat already absorbed everything to the bottom of the seat... so I looked through internet try to see what I need to do and found about "auto/car detailing service". my next step was to find out the place and I had a list full of auto detailing service centers and pro car care was one of it. looked through reviews, calling all the places, if they don't pick up I even made trip there. finally I decided to give pro car care try, and staff were very friendly, kind, and nicely explained to me how and what they will do. only thing was they were so booked and I had to wait until the 30th of April, but he told me he will gives me a call back as soon as he finds out one appointment gets canceled or I could go ahead and reserve a spot but then if I find other place that they can do earlier it's totally fine for me to go cancel theirs. I ended up getting call and heard good news that I could get my service the very next day. now I only smell fresh when I get in my car!
absolutely loved their service, nice staff, and will go back in the future when I need professional cleaning with my car again!

name: Lauren Kiskunes
text: Wonderful experience! I took my car in for an interior detail and PCC was able to remove years of stains from my microfiber seats. Friendly and quality service! Would recommend to anyone.

name: John Bierman
text:
I will be back .They did a great job. I recommend them to anyone else.
Very friendly and informative staff.

name: Dorothy Evans
text: When I expressed that I would like for my vehicle to look as much like it looked when I bought it I didn’t know it could look that way again. Excellent work! This is what detailed means. Every little cranny and nook was detailed. Thanks Pro Car Care team!!  Love my new clean vehicle!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Ms. Evans! We love to see our customers smile! We always strive to exceed expectations and we're happy that we were able to do this for you! Feel free to come see us again if you need us!

name: Bruce Engler
text: This place was absolutely amazing! It is a nice family run company and they are very polite and friendly. They did a more than excellent job on my car. Very impressed!

resp.text:
It was a pleasure to meet you Bruce! So glad to be able to help! If you need anything else in the future, just reach out.

- Marcus, owner

name: Brent Smith
text: Marcus did an amazing job getting the scratches out of my truck. It shined when he was finished. Also he took the time to get all the dog hair out of the back floorboard which was very nice considering how much was there.

name: Lee Mendoza
text: My Jeep went through the clay bar process to remove over spray. Upon pick up I told them to go back over the vehicle because of missed areas. About one month later I'm still finding wax residue on my Jeep in easily accessible areas. These guys are great at washing cars but when it comes to "detailing", I'd give them an 85% on paying  attention to detail. Something to consider if you have an expensive vehicle that you want to have taken care of. I personally won't go back.

name: Elizabeth Scheeter
text: After moving, travel with three small children, and life in general, it's been a while since our family vehicle was cleaned properly. If I'm being honest, I can only describe the condition as repulsive. We took our Toyota Sienna to Pro Car Care today. My husband picked it up this afternoon, and we were shocked! The interior looks better than when we bought it! The seats are spotless and soft. The carpet looks great. The cup holders on the floor between the second row seats are now pristine, which is a huge deal since my older two climb over that space to get to their seats. Our Weather Tech mats look new again. The exterior looks great as well. Marcus (owner) was incredibly friendly each time I spoke with him. We chatted several times about what the van would need, and he never pressured us into any services. He even called this afternoon after my husband got home to see what I thought. Great service,  great work. Would definitely recommend!

name: Katie McCleary
text: Marcus is so great and helpful, he stayed late to make sure I got the service I needed and could leave town the next day. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for kind and friendly service and good results.

resp.text: Katie, it was my pleasure making sure that you were satisfied with my service and still have plenty of time to leave town on time! Thank you very much for your kind words. I really appreciate it! -Marcus M., Owner

name: Bonnie Wise
text: This is the 2nd time we have used this company, and I have to say that I am very impressed!  The first time was about 10 months ago: we took our son out for his 21st birthday when he came home on leave from the Navy .. now I still to this day can not figure out how the physics on this worked, but driving down 85 from Montgomery to Opelika the alcohol came up.  Head out the window and upchuck, but it somehow managed to not only get EVERYWHERE in the SUV (I am talking back of the headrests, back seats, entire cargo area, and CEILINGS), but also from the front of the car and windshield to the bumper .. and he was in the back seat .. while I was doing 70 mph!! Quite impressive to say the least!  Well, he had the choice to clean it himself, or have it detailed .. he chose detailed (roflmao).  We took it to Pro Car Care and I honestly though there was no way my vehicle would ever be the same .. they proved me wrong!! It looked (and smelled) like it did rolling it off the lot with 10 miles on it!!  The owner, his wife, and all the employees are delightful!!  We just got back from having it detailed again and again I can not rave enough about their work!  Highly recommended!!  Thank you so much for all your attention to detail!!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing to come to us Bonnie! We're grateful to help you and your son! We use steam to clean our interiors which offers better results and is known to make your car look as good as new! We're glad our work has impressed you. You can always count on this level of care and detail from us. Let us know if we can help with anything else. -Marcus M., Owner

name: Tiffany Childs
text: I bought my car from a private dealer who had been driving it and apparently had let some boiled eggs roll off the seat and disappear only to be discovered by me the day after purchasing and driving our family down to the beach. We noticed an odor upon purchase but had been masked with a ton of air fresheners. It wasn’t until the smell quickly became unbearable that we discovered the culprit. I wasn’t sure if the smell would ever come out but Marcus, the owner assured me he could get it out and he did! Not only did he basically steam clean the entire car top to bottom, but also detailed everything as if it was brand new again while also cleaning out the air ducts to ensure the quality of air we were breathing was clean and safe. The leather seats are now SOFT and smooth as well as the steering wheel now looks brand new. I cannot thank him enough and would recommend his business to anyone. He works very hard, is incredibly  professional and truly cares about his customers. I will be a forever customer! Thanks, again Pro Auto Care!

name: Brandi Wilson
text: I actually didn't get my car detailed yet, but I want to review the customer service I got when I stopped to talk about the details. I just repossessed a car from my nephew who dirtied up the inside of a brand new car. He used every cubby for an ash tray. The head liner was stained. I need some real detail work and I've seen the great work Pro Car Care puts out. Everyone was awesome! As soon as I pulled up someone greeted me, looked at my car and talked about my biggest concerns with it. He explained what the will do for my goals. I told him the price was a little too much for me at that time. So he kindly bargained with me, talk to his boss too make sure everyone was ok with that. I'll be taking it back next week! He was awesome and kind and seemed to care about my goals also.

name: Gregory Brewer
text: I bought a Tahoe that was so nasty on the inside I would not let my dog in it. The carpet was black and the whole thing was trashed. I dropped it off and told them to do their best and when I went to pick it up I was blown away. I could not believe what a great job they did. The carpet was not black anymore and it looked like a new car. I was amazed at what a great job they did and how nice they were. I will be taking all my cars there in the future.. By far the best car care place ever!

name: marcus ogletree
text: My name is Jackie Johnson of Jackie Johnson Employment Services in Auburn, AL.  I have been using Pro Car Care for several years and they have always done a fantastic job on all my vehicles.  They have always taken the time and effort to ensure that I was happy and satisfied.  I have recommended Pro Car Care to all my friends and colleagues and I can honestly say that everyone is extremely happy.  It is the only company in the Opelika/ Auburn area that I trust, so if you need your car detailed make sure see Marcus at Pro Car Care on Pepperell Pkwy in Opelika, AL.

name: Arnold McCray
text: Very spiritual individual professionals courteous also very loving person.

resp.text: Arnold, thank you for your review! I'm glad that you like our caring service. If you need us again, don't hesitate to reach out! -Marcus M., Owner

name: Austin Bond
text: I have been going here for about a month now and they do a great job, all the guys know what they are doing and the owner is friendly. Best place in the Auburn/Opelika area!

name: Tonya Strickland
text: WORST DETAIL EXPERIENCE EVER!! They apparently used a solution on my rims that was too strong and ruined them!! My rims are clearly corroded from the cleaning solution they used and when i took it back the next day, the manager tried to blame me!! He claimed i brought my car in like that and it was break dust on the rims so i didnt notice the metal was burned off!!! WHO DOES THAT!!!  I drive my vehicle everyday, there is no way i  wouldn't have notice if they looked that bad!!!  I had co-workers that saw my car in the parking lot the next day to call my office and say, "what happened to your car"!!  I took it to a couple other datail shops the same day and they all agreed, the damage done to my rims was new!  There was no rust spots on my rims which would have indicated the corrosion would have already previously been there.  There was dirt under my floor mats where the floor had not even been vacuumed!!!  The seats still had the same spots on them i was trying to have removed and the interior had smudge or residue marks on it!!  I am accustomed to receiving SERVICE when i patronize a business, this mess is ridiculous!!!!  I will personally visit every business i know in town that use this service including my company and show them my reality of having to purchase new rims, and request that they no longer use this service and pull their contracts.

text: Great work car looks and feels new again

Best value and quality around.

We pulled up and told them we were going to just get a cheap car wash because we just really needed the vacuum we were going on a trip. The Young man helping us, told us that the vacuums are free we did not need to get a car wash just to use the vacuum. Which was great being that it was going to rain all week long anyway and we were going on this trip. But I thought to myself that is somebody that really appreciates their customers. And it makes me want to tell everyone I know if you want a good car wash with great service Shine Time is the place to go!

name: Gene Garza
text: This place is fantastic. Prior to having children, I would detail my own cars frequently and I know how to clean a car inside and out, and how to spot a poor wash job. These guys are pros. I've been to one of the big chain places recently and was disappointed. But I'll keep coming back here. They're happy to have my business and it shows. Their prices are really great, too, making it a tremendous value.

name: Lauren Rawdon
text: I brought in my 10 year old gmc truck around 3pm to get a full detail, including headlight restoration, for $150. I was told my truck would be ready by 5pm. I was skeptical that a full detail, interior and exterior, could be done in 2 hours, but thought I’d give this small business a chance. The truck was ready at 530pm. The exterior, which was waxed and buffed, looked like it was well done. Many scratches and scuffs that did not come out with regular car washes were gone, including scratches on one of my headlights. Now for the bad part. The truck bed and toolbox were untouched. The floor mats were left in my truck bed, untouched. The dashboard still had a layer of dust on it. The plastic interior, when wiped with a magic eraser after getting home, continued to remove many noticeable areas of grime. I was happy with the majority of the exterior, but there were too many areas of the vehicle left neglected to call this a “full detail”. You’d do better spending $250 and going with a legitimate car detailing business.

text: I have been a 30 year customer but had a terrible experience today and will not go back.  The cashier was incredibly rude to me. I paid extra for love bug removal. When I questioned why the love bugs were still there after the wash, the cashier was once again rude and said I needed to understand it was not guaranteed removal.  No where on the signage did it disclose it was not guaranteed. The manager finally refunded my money after a long discussion about the rude cashier and my dissatisfaction with their service.  Long story short, I will find a new car wash with better appreciation for their customers. Encourage you to do the same.

name: Robby Clark
text: WORST experience I've had with a company. I ordered the Kelsey special, $26.  Left my car to get vacuumed and to go through the car wash. As my car exits the car wash someone is supposed to get into the vehicle and pull it to the side to get wiped down and dried off, but instead THEY ALLOWED IT TO ROLL INTO MADISON AVE!!!!!!!! If came within an inch of being hit. One of the workers finally got into my car and pulled back into the parking lot. I went back to the young lady at the desk and asked for the manager. The manager came out asked what was going on and I explained to her what happened. She told me no there is an hump that stops the vehicles. So, I explained to her again what happened. She looked at me and said I'll talk to the crew. With no apology or anything she walked outside and I never saw her again. My vehicle was finally done. Very  mediocre job of drying and wiping everything down.  Employee raises his hand for me to come out there. He asked how I was, I explained not good cause my car rolled into the middle of the street. He said " WE HAD CAUD IT DO".  All I could do is shake my head and leave.  If you use this car wash pray someone gets in your vehicle before it rolls into the street. Good Luck.

name: Thomas Shappley
text: If you don't spend 10 minutes scrubbing your car before you send it through the wash it will still be dirty, just now wet and dirty. So to get your car clean you have to wash it yourself before you pay them to rinse it. You'll need to repeat that step 4 to 5 times to finally get your car clean. The vacuums suck so there's that.

resp.text:
Thomas - We hate to hear your experience wasn't up to your standards and would love to know how we could improve! If you'd like to chat further, our website has the number to both locations. Feel free to let us know so that we can make it better!
Just for clarity, the bug prep station is the 'scrubbing your car' you are speaking of. It actually contains a formula that helps break down any bug or road remnants prior to the wash. So this aids in not only breaking down unwanted residue, it ensure you the the spots you prefer to be squeaky clean... are squeaky clean.
If you felt the tunnel was insufficient, we would've loved to have heard about it! We're always willing to help or send someone back through, no charge, to make sure you're taken care of. In fact, if you'd like to try us again, the wash will be on us.
And finally, thanks for bragging on the vacuums. We think they suck, too.😉
Have a great day, Thomas. We are eager to earn your business and appreciate you giving us a try!

name: J Mills
text: Friendly staff. Quick, thorough car wash. Just what my dirty ride needed today.

Like vacuums would just fall off at the head or the mat cleaner machine doesn't work. Guess I won't be a member much longer if this continues but it is convenient being close to home I think that's why I've stayed so long otherwise out.

We are sorry about your experience
Please let us know when you are on site
It’s takes few seconds to fix
It depends on previous user
Again we are extremely sorry and will try to keep up with it

text: Quick and easy car wash.  Never had a problem going through.  One time fee and you can get a towel each time you go through.  Vehicles always look good afterwards.

text:
Close to home, this place is convenient and, with a membership, saves a bunch on regular washes. The more you go, the more you save. The quality of the wash is very good and the customer service is good.
The only thing that would make it better would be free towel service.

text: Great place!

name: ima Horn
text: The girls working the place were nice.

name: Michele Klemm
text: I went Saturday morning. The attendendts were friendly and very through. Car wash got all of the bugs off of the front of the car and the windshield. I highly recommend this car wash to everyone! Great Customer service! Great Car wash for the price! Towel program is right on point. The towels were clean and removed everything from dust to  cleaning the windows. I love to give my money back to the local business owners. Keep up the great job!

text: Vaccums don't have enough suction.

name: thatdisabledude33
text: Good overall

text: Does a great job. Free vac and air (spray the dust off your dash!). Car is always very clean after going through this wash

name: Gary Rush
text: Great facility with very nice staff. We can always depend on Wash It Off to keep our vehicles clean and presentable.

name: Jerry Sims
text: We purchased the 7$ carwash simply to get the pollen off the car.  When we pulled up two young boys were attending the entry, one on his phone the other spraying the car with some type of spray.  We went through the wash and it seemed to be doing fine but on exiting the car was not even close to dry.  I went up to the entry and one of the young men asked how he could help and I told him I needed a towel to dry off my car.  He asked what price package I got and when I told him he said that the $7 wash does not provide the deluxe dry and to get it I would need to by the $$$ price.  I didn't say anything but my mind came up with a great solution.  I will go back to MARC -1in Alabaster where they understand that a half A.... job does not get customers but once.

resp.text:
We are very sorry about your inconvenience at the wash. We are also sorry that we failed to fully explain the drying system on our different washes. Our Fire & Ice and Blazing washes include dry and shine unlike the basic and deluxe washes. If there's anything we can do to help your previous experience, please let us know as soon as possible. Customer service is our number one goal. Please contact us with any regards or concerns.
(205)620-9274
620wash@gmail.com

name: Storey Rowell
text: This is the worst car wash I've ever been to. It does not clean your car and you have streaks of dirt on your car after you go through the wash! Not sure how you would fix this but the owner should definitely look into it. Love the vacuums. Please fix the wash!

name: Elizabeth Davenport
text: Quick, simple, affordable. In and out in less than 10 minutes.

name: Vincent
text: Don't go here if you have an antenna on your vehicle. One of the employees yanked out my antenna by using a pair of pliers instead of using the pliers to twist off the antenna. If he would've asked me how to take the antenna off, I would've done it myself. I am thankful that they will reimburse me for the new antenna. That does not negate the fact I am inconvenienced by getting the remnants of my broken antenna out of my vehicle and going to buy a new antenna.

name: Sally “Sally” M
text: The staff this morning were rude and obviously didn't want to be there. Ask for a clean cloth and when I turned around he slammed the lid down and about made me jump out of my skin  .  I will drive to Pelham from now on.

resp.text:
Sandy
I  am sorry for how you felt
Please give us one more chance and we will make sure everything is good and clean and people who works enjoy working

name: Diana Barefield
text: This place is lacking in every department! My vehicle was still dirty the vacuums were awful! The wash put a dent on my truck. Would not recommend anyone going here. Very dissatisfied customer.. I would wash my truck by hand before having to go here ever again!

resp.text:
I am sorry for that
Did you talk to the employees in charge
Can you give us one more chance
Ask for Jay

name: Joey Smith
text:
When they first opened all was good except the fact the automatic dryer did a poor job of drying my truck.  Employees recognized it and were quick to grab you a towel and in some cases even dry the car by hand for me as a sign of excellence service .  At the time it was managed by a very nice and professional young lady.  The place was also packed with cars which is a great sign for business .  Out of know were if you asked for a towel to dry the water there dryer missed after spending 18.00 dollars they wanted an extra 5 dollars to simply use a used towel. Not to purchase towel to keep but 5 bucks just to use the towel.  I never came back except one time to wash my company truck in a pinch.    I then noticed they had a towel program you pay monthly and the place clearly had lost a ton of business as its usually not very busy.  So sad an arrogant greedy cheap owner didnt learn the basics of running a business in business school.   1 year later today I took my personal truck that I was going to dry myself at home the same truck that had been through the wash many times before they turned my truck away after paying them.   They informed me they know longer except trucks with oversize aftermarket tires which over 30 percent of trucks these days have .  No other car wash has that policy .  Either tire fits on the track or it doesnt .  Reason for decision was having to replace rollers more often than without trucks with 34 inch tires or bigger going through the wash .  So being a cheap wad which is very common in his culture is resulting in lost business.  Clearly a hard headed person .

A simple paper hand written sign could have been posted but instead I waited 5 minutes for them to refund my money then had to drive through vacuums at a sharp angle which almost resulted in my truck hitting there pole.  Not one person tried to guide me or be on the lookout for what I couldn't see. It's now  Ran by a bunch of high school kids who can give zero ducks about customer service .   I now use Anthony in Pelham but was making exception today as I was in a pinch.   Best wash is mister car wash on 280 but I dont leave on that side of town.  A car wash banning big trucks in Shelby county ?  Wow what an idiot .

name: Greg Smith
text: After going through I still had bug guts on the front of my car and the wash didn't even touch most of the tail end. I asked the guy working there if I could run it back through. His plan was to just use a soapy sponge sponge, so after $18 my car is still dirty. I read several reviews, your carwash needs work or you're going to lose a lot of business.

resp.text:
Gregory Smith we are extremely sorry for your dissatisfaction . The soapy sponge helps to get the bugs off easily then the machine .
If you can give us an opportunity we will make sure to your satisfaction
When you come please ask for Jay
We will appreciate it sir

name: Austin Ehrhart
text: Wash quality was ok, but not as good as others in the area. Not sure if the machines are not calibrated properly or if they are not using liquids properly. My small car was only a little dirty, and I was still wiping wet dirt off with the towel after I got my wash.

resp.text:
We are extremely sorry for your experience.
We wish you could have talk to person in charge .
Can you email us your email address please.
We would like to make sure you are satisfied
Thank you
Jay
620wash@gmail.com

text:
Can’t type enough positive words about this location but I’ll try. People ? Absolutely wonderful human beings working as a team.  Food ? WoW , best tacos in a hundred miles easy.
Environment ? Clean , very clean.
The owners are wonderful and treat the team members like family.  This is now my full time convenience store and Mexican restaurant. Thank you very much Mirika and Kayla - you’re both wonderful. I gave five stars because there wasn’t an option for ten. This is the new PB near the RR tracks in Calera and the bonus is there is a liquor store too lol.

name: Anthony Cameron
text: They did great work and my truck looks wonderful 👏 😊

name: Wade L
text: The WORST "detail" job I ever paid for. Undercarriage and wheels barely touched. Streaks everywhere. Inside was horrible. Did not even bother to vacuum under floor mats. Seats, visors, headliner, door handles, A/C vents, not even touched. Had to get him to clean off the seats before I left because they were still dirty. Instead of cleaning, just rubbed everything down with oil. Inside didn't smell clean or fresh. Dust everywhere inside. Gave him two vehicles to "detail" and both were horrible jobs. Do not waste your money here.

name: ashley Moran
text: These guys are awesome! They have great attitudes and are very easy to work with. I bought a car from them recently and they worked with me in every way possible. I highly recommend Austin & Tommy (the owners). I wouldn't go anywhere else to buy a vehicle, they truly care about their customers. LOVE them!!!!

name: Jodie McKinley
text: As much as I would like to leave more stars for the quick and efficient buying of a truck from Kip, I have to say that TNT sold us a lemon. The truck we bought in November has something wrong with it every week which means my husband is throwing money at parts instead of trying to make the payment. They sold us an expensive extended warranty that we knew nothing about and when the air conditioner went out in the truck, we were told the warranty covers powertrain ONLY. Save time and money and shop elsewhere, There are plenty more reputable dealers around that won't sell you a piece of junk.

name: Clint Chance
text: They welcomed us in with open arms, were more than accommodating. Staff was friendly, however pre-occupied. We bought our vehicle in September. The owner was willing to pay for faulty sensors on the vehicle found at time of purchase. The only major complaint that I have is to Make sure that they complete ALL the paperwork before you leave to help you avoid frequent subsequent trips to sign your name.

text: Absolutely the best in the business!!! We got an excellent deal on our Acadia.  It's fully loaded, excellent condition and we couldn't be happier.  Highly recommended!!

name: Michael Goins
text: I went to 2 of Mobile's highest rated car detailers with my car due to me having sap dried on my paint.  WIth no luck at either of these places I contacted TNT and took the car in and in no time my car was back to looking brand new again!!  I refer this place to anyone now who is looking for someone to detail their vehicle..  Staff could not have been nicer and accommodating!!

Every inch of my car shone like new by the time they were finished--mats, leather, glass, cupholders, console, door pockets, everything. And for a more than reasonable price. name: Amber Matz
text: I'll never, ever, rate a single star to this gas station; not even a half of a star, bc it doesn't  deserve any at all, seriously...the only reason I had to select 1 is bc I'm forced to in order to post a review! Lol , not surprised.  It pisses me off, though, how these employees... @ the Shell/Circle k store#:21569 in Theodore...& I'm talking about  the ones @ this store ONLY, especially the older brown lady that worked on the night of thursday Nov 1st 2018 , is the worst of them all, bc many times, in line, I've witnessed her, and other employees, show their ridiculously rude attitude, being completely unprofessional..& they all have their jobs still!!??? I mean the position requires top notch customer service...actually, I'm lying,  it doesn't even require "good customer service", bc customer service doesn't take much effort at all!! If you are even the slightest bit capable to understand how to smile, respond to a question with that smile, and be available to do YOUR job, like YOU were hired to do when YOU APPLIED (no one asked you to apply for the position...especially when you are not capable to atleast do those extremely simple things/requirements), then, anyone, who is anyone, can work in customer service if they allow themselves to be genuine. Anyone will easily  outshine  the current employees. As well as, a difference in profits will most likely  be seen, bc these current employees obviously are  not fit one bit due to their lack of simple professionalism.  As long as ive lived here, in Theodore, I've only come across 2 girls that are not part of the problem. 1 of the 2 girls still wrk there,  and she was working on the 1st as well but she was off by 8pm. The gas station could be a 5 star, but the ppl chosen to be the face of your location, are far from great choices.. unfortunately !! if it's employees weren't so extremely rude, lazy, and unprofessional & theyd look at you like you're literally stupid because you asked a question they don't feel like responding to, like you're interrupting their damn day!. Anyway,  it's almost like it's always been the gas station that's known for hiring the same type of wrong ppl, that carry themselves very unprofessional bc they just don't care!!
