name: Mohammad Alam
text:
Got the quick detail (package) for my family van after a long road trip. It is reasonable to have second thoughts from the appearance of the shop, however it’s good not to judge a book by its cover. Had exceptional experience from the folks who washed my car. Great group of guys, just having fun, being efficient at their job and doing it with quality! I sure will be returning and highly recommending!
P.s they are really accommodating and try to address your needs to the best of their abilities!

name: John Schade
text: This place is the real deal. Got a ‘quick detail’ for $50 and it was on par with the quality and attention I’ve had with full details at other places. Takes some time but good quality takes time. Highly recommend!  Make sure to throw in a good tip for these guys, they work hard to get your car looking good.

name: Natalie Unger
text: I was so disappointed! There was still pollen and dirt all over the car, and they left two long scratches on my back window! I didn’t even bother bringing it up to them because they were so rude and unprofessional from the minute I drove up. They told me my car was ready and I had to go searching for my keys since no one was paying attention. Just really bummed.

name: Sherika Felder
text: Overall great experience and value for the price.

name: Brittany Clepper
text: Owner claimed a ‘Mouse’ did this... seriously?! Dropped off for a simple oil change and picked up with a ruined steering wheel and an offended mother. Never go to this place. You will leave here feeling insulted, and with ruined belongings.

resp.text: *ATTENTION* I'm sorry ma'am. Wrong business we don't offer Oil Changes. Hand car wash detailing only

name: Gloria Esoimeme
text: These guys used to do a good job but I can’t even begin to describe how dissatisfied I am with their job today. There were dirt particles on the front of my car seat as well as stains that could easily be wiped off with a wet rag. I am heading home to go clean my car myself. It was a waste of my time and money. I won’t be coming back again.

name: Andy Lee
text: I read the good reviews about this place online and saw where many people said they paid $50.00 which I thought was fair. They have no prices listed online or at the shop so they just charge you what they want. I got there with a friend following me so I could leave my 2004 Accord and was told he could wash the outside and clean up the inside for $165.00 but that didn't include waxing or any deep cleaning.  I was in shock. I told him I saw online that it was $50.00 and I just want a simple clean up. It's a cheap car and I'm not spending $165.00. He said he could wash it and wipe down the inside for $65.00. I ask him why all the reviews said $50.00? He said he didn't know. I would have tipped $10.00 or $15.00 but I didn't leave my car because I felt he was trying to rip me off. The place looks sleezy for a reason. They change you by your looks and what car is picking up. They don't post prices because so they rip you off. I would happily paid $65.00 if I thought that's what they charged everyone else. Stay away! They just want to rip you off!

name: Lulu Lee
text: It was great. Good service

name: Lo Williams
text: @Jennifer Moorer No business around is going to do a 52ft trailer infested with thousands of ants and chicken blood all in the inside for $50.00 that’s just unheard of and very preposterous. Also, we will be contacting the better business bureau so they can see the footage of the trailer and the way your trucking company chooses to haul food around. We appreciate you stopping by sir and with that being said have a blessed day #SpickNKlean

name: Muhammad Ali Khan
text: One of the best car wash that I have been to. Although you can easily miss the place while driving towards it and it is not the most fancy car washes but the staff does a fabulous job. I would highly recommend it. Plus it is very economical.

name: Juan Lopez
text: I lived in Montgomery for over two years and I am a loyal customer. I will be leaving the area soon and had to come one last time to get my car wash here. You can tell it is a family owned business because they will wash your car like it is their own. My car always comes out looking like a brand new vehicle. They are very professional and it is a great atmosphere and I would highly recommend anyone that wants their car wash to come here!

name: Duston Woodyard
text: They are very friendly and professional. Their prices are reasonable and the work they will do on your car in amazing. They hand wash your car so it’s not a quick wash. They take their time you ensure you a satisfied customer. They take great pride in their work.

name: Andrew Williams
text: S&K does great work!!!

name: Fabian Erica
text: I am TDY here and wanted to get my car detailed. My friend who is also TDY recommended this place. When I got there it looked a little sketchy but my friend had raved so much about them that I had to try it out. My friend also recommended to point out what areas I wanted them to pay special attention to. I honestly wasn't expecting much because he said the service was only $50. I have paid double that and wasn’t satisfied (I have high standards). Anyway, I picked up my car after 3 hours and my car was truly immaculate. It is the best inside detail work I have seen. I honestly feel like I should have paid at least double what I paid. I gave them a good tip for that. I hope anyone who is reading this review give these hard working guys a try and I hope they keep putting the same effort they did with my car. Thank you so very much! I wish I lived here so I could take my car in every month. The front desk girl was also very nice, and the guy who I talked to about my car was very professional and even made sure to clean my son’s car seat (and underneath) which was pretty dirty.

name: Mr. Raney
text: I really enjoyed my experience at S and K Hand car wash. The staff are very personable and easy going. I told them to take their time, that I wasn’t in any hurry and they still got me out in about 40 minutes. Their prices are very reasonable and their quality of work is impressive. They washed, vacuumed, and detailed the interior of my wife’s car and only charged $35. After dealing with the friendly staff I had no problem paying an extra $10 as a tip for their services. I’m from Tuscaloosa and to have the same service done where I’m from would atleast cost $50 or more and wouldn’t match the quality I received. If I’m back in Montgomery, I will definitely be stopping by again.

name: G B
text: Every time i am in town I make this place one of my stops. The guys are honest hard working and deserve your business. It has been a long time since I have witnessed a car wash that gives you more than you pay for.  They are always friendly, courteous and the prices are reasonable for the quality of work they do. Thanks and keep up the good work fellas. Keep my truck and car blinging.

name: Lamont Willis
text: Super job always

name: Saria T
text: They did amazing job with my white Jaguar XF. The owner was very pleasant. I wish they were in DC where I reside currently . I was traveling though Alabama, and decided to get my car wash. They took care of my vehicle. Highly recommended. Thank you ! I need to touch base with the owner to thank him again lol.

name: O'Neal
text: I dropped off a vehicle to have seats inside cleaned and shampooed. The vehicle had light cream colored seats with stains in them. They took the vehicle right in and started working on it before I left. Within a few hours, I recieved a phone call to come pick up. I was highly impressed and very very happy with they're work I tipped the guy who worked on it. I highly recommended this particular detail shop. If they can get the stains out of these seats that says alot. I really appreciate the work they put in. Will definitely be coming back for all my inside detailing of vehicles.

name: Stephanie LaBrash
text: Visiting in town from Atlanta for an unexpected funeral, I needed a last minute detail and cleaning this afternoon.  No wait at all, everyone is professional and friendly, and they did a thorough job inside and out for a reasonable rate while I waited in a comfy waiting area, with a full view of the detailing area.  They take cards as well as cash, and they do conveniently let you put the tip on your card, which few places do, and I appreciate that. They get my recommendation.

name: Daniel Jones
text: Brought my truck here before going to trade it in. When he first told me $45 bucks for a wash I thought it was a little pricey but an hour of hard work later my truck looks excellent. Excellent people who do great work.

name: antoine sprowel
text: My car was cleaned better any drive-thur car wash. The service was excellent and the wait time wasn't bad. Definitely worth coming here would come back again.

name: Stacy Young
text: Very nice atmosphere did an awesome job on my truck! I will be a regular customer. Malik is so sweet and took good care of me.

name: Keyia H
text: I would like to write a review even though I did not receive service from this location. I called to receive a car wash and interior seat cleaning. I spoke to a gentleman at this location and he was overly nice explained the different packages, the prices, and any other information that I needed. It's sad to say that I idiotically put in the wrong address and ended up at the wrong car washing location. And since I had never been it to this location I didn't know I was at the wrong one. And even though I called back to let them know I was not coming for my appointment at 2 he was still overly friendly and just asked that I come it to them the future. And as I'm sitting here at this wrong location typing out this review at a place that has people that are NOWHERE near as friendly I regret that I didn't get the chance to go to SNK.

name: Jacqueline Vaughan
text: Highly recommend this business. Very comfortable and friendly atmosphere. Great  service  for the price.

name: The Mighty O
text: These folks are professional and thorough! I took my vehicle here as I was visiting the area for Tuskegee's Homecoming.. They got me squeaky!

name: William Finney Jr
text: They get five stars for being able to make a 20 year old filthy van look like it was bought yesterday both inside and out! They did a fantastic job on something that wasn't cleaned for years!

name: SupremelyKAY
text: S&K did an awesome job. The employees are very nice and professional.

name: bhanu prakash
text: Great Service. Detailing is really awesome. Would recommend this place ....

name: Philip Porter
text: Best and cheapest car wash I've ever had. I've been all over the country.

name: Nigel Ivy
text: Great experience!!!! I got my churches van serviced after a camping trip I just wish I had some before and after pics!!!  Thank Big Joe and T.

name: Mike 921
text: From Philly and down here visiting from Va. And I ain't wanna ride around in a dirty wheel so after jumpin  online I came across S&K and I chose to read the review because it wasn't far from where I'm chillin. So after a reading like 10 reviews I said f__k it I'm gone give them so play, cuz was laid back and told me it'll be an hour but he came and got the keys b4 that and cleaned the rental that I didn't really wanna drive (2018 Camry) so damn good that I kinda felt bad about complaining to my lady about it lol. But seriously though I didn't really want no Camry but since that's all they had I took it, But any way while waiting it kinda felt like I was either back in Philly chillin and Va at my homeboy detail shop, the lounge area is nice and u get to see through the window while the cleaning ur car which was nice it kinda gives u that vibe like if u one of those scary or paranoid people that don't trust nobody and think everybody in the hood is gonna steal from, it'll make u feel better cuz u watching them clean ur car. I didn't think and don't think that way but I got the message after checking out my surroundings. I'll  come back when I come back to Bama. A yo to the brother that washed the 2018 Blue Camry u told me ur brother was up Philly, tell him next time he goes to the city get a real cheese steak from Maxx's they are located at Broad & Erie right on the corner. It's hood but seen how laid back u are I would think he is too so he'll be aiight. Thanks again 4 taking care of that jawn it looks really good. I'll holla

name: staneka jones
text: Would recommend this place,very nice atmosphere,would definitely come back!!!

name: Matt Baker
text: Fast and friendly service, they did and amazing job would recommend

name: Jerrinika Choice
text: Great car wash.... Fast service!

name: Anthony Sharpe
text: Did a good job cleaning my car.

name: Jamario Smith
text: The staff is very nice and professional.

name: Jennifer Moorer
text: He's not a real boss or business man 💯

name: Jared Pope
text: They are cheap and do great work as well!!

name: Mauri Gator
text: A1 service always

name: ONE NATION (ONE NATION)
text: Very nice

name: Sash hsaS
text: Great service

name: Shelley Williams
text: Great job!

name: Darrius Griffin
text: The best in The City!

name: SHONDALE ANDERSON
text: Great Expierene Excellent customer service high recommended!!!!!!!!

name: Sidney Corum
text: Attention to the little details that make a hand car wash just right!!

name: Abdulgader Alzahrani
text: The best in Montgomery

name: Sharon Jones
text: Very horrible, poor quality, half ass job

name: jared blankenship
text: The two girls working the afternoon of June 14th 2021 were very hard working and went the extra on my bug covered work truck. Very pleased.

name: Emmett Griffin
text: Very good car wash!

name: Alan H
text: Always does a great job even when busy you get through quick free vacuum, nice towels and window and general cleaner spray and rug cleaner for no charge highly suggest joining the membership

name: tom hogan
text: This is the place I take my car to be washed. They do a good job of cleaning it before your car goes through the automatic car wash. Then you can clean your windows and interior with products they provide. Their vacuums do a good job too.

name: Lance Griggs
text: Pretty good wash, never like you can do at home but it does the trick!

name: Cathy Snyder
text: It was an ok wash of my car. For $19  it should have been pristine buy alas it wasn't.  If your car is already pretty clean then it would be great. But I will not go back.

name: Ryan Watson
text: Best automatic car wash around! I take my truck here all the time and it always comes out perfectly washed. I really like that they have a group of people who pre-wash the bugged up areas for you before you go into the actual wash!

name: Jeremy “jmacmillywoods” Milwood
text: Grest carwash. Free vacuums, towels, and mat cleaners. Wish it had independent prewash stations to remove bugs and grime yourself. Employees try to remove all they can but it doesn't remove it all in the 15 seconds they have to prep your car.

name: Lisa Hall
text: Young people there work hard. I highly  recommend it

name: shadow
text: Always love coming here, because my car actually gets clean! However this time they were busy! So I had a lot more spots on my car than usual. I got the give it all we got option and it was a 20 dollar wash....wasn't impressed.

name: Stephen Moss
text:
It's a new facility and so far so good.

What sets The Wash apart is the personal service we've experienced, both by management (helping with setting up our accounts) as well as the hands-on spraying and brush down before entering the abbreviated mechanical car wash.

My wife drives an older Cayenne whose finish I try to keep up with. Washing once a week at Marc1 had left the paint badly scratched and dull after just six months.

Before switching from Marc1, I re-compouded, re-polished and ceramic coated the finish.

It's been several months now and the paint definitely is holding up much better.

Either The Wash is using superior water filtration or the brushes are being cleaned and maintained aggressively, I'm happy with the service.

But time will tell. Marc1 was great when new, but lately not so much.

name: Jayden Summer
text: I love getting my car washed here because it actually cleans but the employees attitudes! Like if you hate your job then quit! I don’t understand why people have to be so rude they used to have the nicest crew but the ones that have been here the last couple of times I came to get a wash don’t care at all.

name: Buddy Smith
text: Randall is always great with hints, helping his teammates.  A great wash for a good price.

name: Joe Cool
text: Great value and service.

name: John White RCDD
text: Great place for a general wash. Nothing to get excited about tbh but I’d say it’s the best choice within a ten mile radius of Calera. The two girls helped me ensure the wash would get all the nooks etc but let’s be honest, they’re motivation is not driven by salary. Would I go again ? Sure, it serves its purpose well.

name: Patrick Bloom
text: The wash is great and the people prepping your car during pre-wash do a great job as well.

name: Eddie James
text: First visit here, the process was simple and my truck looks great. They have clean towels and cleaner for you to use. I  will be using them again.

name: Ann & Danny Millar
text: Very friendly and Great service @ this wash !

name: Anessa Osborn
text: Easy to get in and out. Did a pretty good job cleaning my car.

name: Terrie Childress
text: Fist time to use this place and I loved it. It was quick and so efficient. I went through on my lunch break and even had time to vaccum my car out.

name: Mark Meadows
text: Nice place to wash your car. Easy as can be. Scan your card and follow the directions of the employees. In and out in 4 min. Free vacuuming as well.

name: Clinton Kennedy
text: Good car wash. Kinda pricey though.

name: Tony Sides
text: Nice newer wash. Everything as expected.

name: Vandore Reeves
text: Great Job all around every time

name: Wanda Johnson
text: Very nice car wash

name: Robby
text: Ok for $15 cheap wash

name: Charles Boothe
text: I like the way they clean your windows and spray your vehicle down before you go through the car wash

name: Maci Martinez
text: Great monthly deal!

name: Ashley Peters
text: Best car wash in Central Alabama!

name: Calli.
text: Superb!

name: Mr. K
text: Scratches your paint and leaves other roots of marks.  I've been trying to get them out for a month now.

name: John Coleman
text: No soap at all. Has really diminished in quality over the last year. Used to be a good value, now very poorly maintained. Just paid 8.00 for some high pressure water.

name: John Mullen
text: Good place to get car clean

name: Patti Edmondson
text: No water came out for wash or rinse on one side, only clear coat Polish then dried. Had to go to other side to rewash which worked fine but did not give a receipt.  Cost me $14 instead of $7. Called number listed on this site. No answer and no voice-mail to leave a msg

name: Miller Albers
text: I went to the place and they told me card was declined. So I put it a 10 dollar bill and waited for 5 minutes it then said transaction cancelled. Please choose a wash. Leaving me out of 10 bucks still with a dirty car. I wouldn't be surprised if I see fraud on my bank statement soon. Don't ever go to this place unless you want to literally flush money down the toilet.

name: GT 43
text: Sorriest car wash I've ever been to.  Needs to be demolished. Don't waste your money.

name: Patricia Williams
text: It convenient, but dirty.  The brushes need cleaning.  All of the vacuums don't suction well.  The stall floors look bad.

name: Mike Carreca
text: I have been going to this one for 15years.  A great no touch wash

name: Derek -
text: wth kinda carwash that dosent even use clean water its GREEn water.

name: Chris Randolph
text:
One star until I get my $6 back that one of the washes took last week.

I called the only numberI found, which was corporate HQ. I also filled out an online contact form.
So far I've heard nothing.

name: Amanda Burch
text: Pretty much run down! I wasn't brave enough to even put my money in the machine

name: Kim Kimbrough
text: I just put my quarters into the vaccum, turned it on, put the hose inside the car and the machine cut off and never came back on. Yes the number attached I did try and of course no one answered bc a fax line came on.

name: Rachel Kring
text: Placed a 5$ bill in the change machinr to get quarters and it ate my money. I had to drive my car back through the car wash to use the money. Wasted 5$.

name: The DuBose Group Real Estate Team
text: Do not leave valuables in your car for full service wash.  All my change and an expensive knife left the glove box. Wish I had known this before I tipped them.

name: Amber Barrett
text: Small I like the big ones better

name: Brandon Howard
text: Very positive experience will return

name: Allen Brown
text: Ok

name: Robert Burns
text: Quick & Clean.

name: kristyn mccarley
text: The car wash scrubber is the best

name: Bethany Adams
text: Closed. Broken. Took money.

name: Stephen Isbell
text: Just went through TWICE!!!!!!!! 1st time left soap all over my car 2nd time wasn't any better car still looks nasty and I'm out 10.00 WORST Car wash(es) I've ever had won't do business again!

name: Chris Thomas
text: Like previous reviews said, one side doesn't work (the right). When I first went through it, it took my money printed the receipt, and I proceeded through. To make it short it didn't work. I then went through the first and it didn't print a receipt. The wash worked but this was unnecessary.

name: Jowairiyya Abdollah
text: The wash was good, vacuum was broken

name: Shelly Bassett
text: Very nice place

name: Kyle Andrews
text: This place left A LOT of small scratches all over my car.

name: Brandon Pouncy
text:
Very low-key gas station in the middle of nowhere. This was the last road trips. We want to take on the way back from New Orleans to Tennessee but when you need gas you need gas.

Definitely your typical gas station with low Lighting in very shady at night. This is one of those gas stations you would prefer if you were the only one there when getting out of the car. The cashier at the time was very uneducated on the surroundings and could not help us with anything.

As far as interior gifts items to buy excetera this gas station had more than enough and we did not have problem buying snacks water and using the restroom. Definitely go in and out if possible and hopefully come out safe. Godspeed gents.

On the plus side if you happen to get hungry there is a Little Caesars attached on the left side. I don't know if they have corresponding hours but during normal hours "Pizza Pizza"

P.S. bring a spare flashlight

name: Jennifer Abbott
text: Great Store

name: Ashley Richardson
text: Nice, clean and friendly. Also, nice and soft toilet paper.

name: D S
text: It was a gas station.. that gave good gas.

name: Karli Eidson
text: The gas was good for my car and they had some good snack selections.

name: Chris Boatwright
text: Great

name: Angie tidmore
text: Convenient location

name: Charles Hickerson
text: Paid 20 dollars for gas,  went to pump it and they put it on the wrong pump.  Someone pumped the gas I paid for,  after they swiped their card. (Swiping your card after having gas paid for doesn't cancel the cash payment or charge their card.) I went inside to ask if I had paid for the pump I was on.  Wound up losing my 20 dollars,  no compensation,  no refund.  Whoever they called said there was nothing they could do.  I don't care about the 20 dollars,  but dishonesty is something that will turn a customer away.

name: David Moseley
text: Always friendly when I'm in here.  Their deli selection is nice during the week, but they're not as busy on weekends.

name: Bigrig Cookin
text: Always polite staff. Great deli. Fresh

name: Tiffany Vinson
text: Good for gas cig n a quick bite to eat

name: Jim Sutphin
text: Great! Food good service

name: B Little
text: Fast service

name: Matt Wayne
text: Good prices.

name: Michael Davies
text: Be Leary of this place. They like to sell cars with no titles and keep all tax money from time of sale for sales taxes and title application fees , and do not properly pay it to the state. I don’t think the old man running it realizes his entire business is about to get shut down for selling cars illegally (meaning you can’t log onto the states websites any longer and create fraudulent title applications for titles you do not posses). You reap what you sow especially when you deceive people knowingly.  He may still be able to detail your car without stealing things from it etc. but when it comes to being a car Salesman, you fail in every aspect. Stick to what you know…. Washing cars for pennies. Leave the selling to the true professionals.

name: Patricia Smith
text: Had my car vacuumed washed and waxed. Looked great. My vehicle is black and I know it is more difficult to make look great, but it looked wonderful.

name: cinthya ulloa
text: First time I came here I was happy with the service, second time I’m not sure if the man who I talked to was the owner o a manager, but he was rude, not coming back.

name: Harry Jones
text: Good place for personal touch on your vehicle.  Make sure you have time to wait or drop it off.  Reasonable price.

name: Johnny Johnson
text: Very good people

name: Caitlin Skinner
text: Awesome group of employees/employers!

name: samuel moore
text: no concern for employees

name: Diane Natale
text: They did a great job cleaning my water soaked floorboard in auto. It looked and smelled brand new. I'm so glad that I took my car here.

name: Landon Meserve
text: Robert and the team do the upmost to make sure you are happy with your vehicle. Hands-down the best in Birmingham.. whether you have an exotic or a daily driver, they will take care of you and make it look better than brand new.

name: Andrea “Anglin” Hooks
text: Great service!!! So friendly. Good prices and conveniently located

name: donna chmielarski
text:
My truck is 5 years old and I had it detailed by Spellmans. The results was way beyond my expectations. The truck looked as new as the day I picked it up from the dealership. I would recommend Spellmans to anyone.
David C

name: Michael McGrath
text: Came here for an estimate on paint repair. Great service and reasonable pricing

name: Brad Robinson
text: Overall solid work for the money. I'd dealt with some flooding after a rainstorm and had tried to clean it up myself with baking soda. They didn't get 100% of the powder out of the carpet but the car has zero odor and no lasting damage. I feel like, under normal circumstances, the work would have been fantastic, particularly for the price.

name: Andre Ferreira
text: very professional,  delivered as described!

name: Jason Watters
text: My 3 year old decided to use my wife’s car as a canvas for his artistic expression. Red crayon all over the ceiling of the new car!!! Well, one email to Spellmans saved the day. Literally one email on a Sunday night turned to quick turnaround visit and now the looks like nothing ever happen. Thanks to Jennifer and the whole staff. I appreciate your prompt service and professionalism. Looking forward to our next visit. Minus red crayon the next time...hopefully!

resp.text: Jason, thank you so much! It was a pleasure meeting you and your wife! We look forward to helping you in the future!

name: Alvey Wolfe
text: Great work and great people!! Would highly recommend them!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jennifer Champion
text: Thank you Spellmans. My car looks amazing!!!

resp.text: Glad we could help! Thank you for your business!

name: Jim Downing
text: Very high prices.

name: Cassie Connell
text: This place is so dirty there is trash everywhere and none of the car wash bays are working. They are shoved full with quarters and I would definitely not suggest going here.

name: Theresa Plunk
text: Not a bad place but they just put in old standard car wash not a hand wash.  They also put a dent in my rear door. As he pulled back up to building from car wash to vacuum.  The man forgot to close rear door.  Pulled forward and my door hit edge of building.  Unfortunately they did nothing about it.  Not even a discount on car wash.  Just an I'm sorry. Guess that's better than nothing.  If I wasn't standing there witnessing it happen I doubt I would have gotten that much.

name: Patricia Knowles-Shreve
text: Dropped my car off to get a inside and out wash, very happy with the results. They even cleaned the floor mats and door panels for me even though it didn’t show it as included! Will probably be back again for a full detail later.

name: Pete Santorelli
text: I've been a customer for 6yrs and this place has always treated me well. They're professional, courteous, and always take care of my vehicles. They are almost always quick with turning around my vehicle. I stick with the full service and get it every couple weeks. Will continue recommending this place!

name: Tim Stewart
text: I was really surprised to read the reviews on here AFTER I had my car detailed. The Bailey Cove location had been recommended by my daughter. The receptionist who made the appointment was incredibly friendly and helpful. I was told the car would be ready at 4:30 and they called at 3:00. I had the ultimate detailing and certainly got my money's worth. The car interior and exterior looks brand new. This was a great experience from scheduling to picking up the car. I was even able to pay with my iPhone using Square which was a novel experience. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them!

name: Courtney Moore
text: Always professional and courteous!!!

name: Brad Hall
text: They do a fine job cleaning, but they used a really strong tropical scent that lingered forever.

name: Red Kerusso
text: Proffessional and seamless cleaning.   They demonstrate a tenacious commitment in making your vehicle look new.  By far the best car wash business I've been to in a while.  Appreciate you and your core values. I bring all my family's vehicles here

name: Carolyn Carter
text: I had the Express Wash last week and was VERY satisfied! They ALWAYS do a great job and are very nice and polite. I've never had any issues and I will continue to drive the hour that it takes me to get to Huntsville, to come here for a great car wash.

name: Will P.
text: I have come to this place for detailing many times and have always been satisfied, the staffs is friendly and professional, and the service is great. I have found early morning is best to save time. I will keep coming back.

name: George Mantis (G-Man)
text:
3 stars for Jones Vallley, 1 star for Madison, averages to 2 stars. The Jones Valley location used to be great. Now they can never even start on your car without at least 2 hours’ wait, regardless of time of day or how busy they are. Under their previous manager, they were fast and always professional, with never a problem. Not any more.

As for Madison... After 8 years of bringing my cars here and nowhere else, I will never do business with them again. I brought my car one day for a full detailing ahead of a lease return. My appointment was for 10am but I brought them my car at 9am. The receptionist told me it'd be done by close of business (5pm). I called at 4:30, and was told 6:30. Then it 6:00 they called to say 7:30. Then at 6:30 they asked if I could wait until tomorrow!?! They had my car ALL DAY and did nothing, even with an appointment. The owner offered only superficial apologies and lots of excuses - "we're very busy" (but I had an appointment!) "it's cold out" "we're not machines." Customers - especially repeat ones accustomed to excellent service - don't want to hear excuses.

name: Jon Bierer
text: Prices are great, service is great. Didn't know they were going to take my car to the wash rack next door to wash, so I was confused at first. They brought it back and detailed it. Looks beautiful.

name: TomKat Fleming
text: Very Disappointed! Using Groupon, I had 2 vehicles washed and waxed at the Jones Valley location  the same day. First, the positive: Both the young man and young lady who waited on us were courteous, friendly, and professional. The wax jobs appear good. The negative: on our SUV, the wax was applied over a non-clean roof and bug splats on the hood. We paid extra to clean the interior of each. This was not the $125 interior detail, just a $12.95 interior cleaning. Not sure what that was to include but since there was an attempt to clean the window and vacuum, I assume that was included. We removed all items from the car to make this easier. On our SUV, the carpet appeared vacuumed in some areas and "untouched" in others. On our sedan, the trunk was not touched. We left empty compartments open for vacuuming/cleaning; that didn't happen. On both vehicles, the seats were not vacuumed.  The interior side of the windows had streaks and smudges. We won't go back.

name: Tory Meeks
text: On the spot has always done a superb job on my truck. I let nobody else touch my truck except on the spot. The customer service is 10/10. The employees always put the customers first, which is something I love most about on the spot. I have been recommending them to everyone for a couple years and will continue to do so.

name: Ingrid Royster
text: Great job!  I just had the 2nd level car wash but the car, tires and carpet look great!  Everything was dusted and the windows look great!! All for $25!!  Super good deal!

name: Shar Saidla
text:
Immediate professional and friendly service!
Thank you for taking good care of me!

name: Kelli Sepanen-Proctor
text: On the Spot is always friendly and professional. I've been coming here for over two years now for their services with my vehicle. They do a nice job of cleaning, waxing and washing.

name: Jessica Koerner
text: I took my car to their University Dr location about a year ago and had a great experience. Not so much at the one here in Jones Valley. I was told the day before that if I dropped my car off before 10am the next day it was guaranteed to be done by 1pm the same day. I wanted a full detail and a headlight scrub, they quoted me $115. I dropped it off at 9:45, and 1pm came and went. Around 4pm no one had called me. I called and they it would be done by 5, and that of course the 1pm was no longer guaranteed. I showed up at 5 and had to wait until 5:30 in the lobby. Then when I went to pay, they added on $65 to the headlight scrub, which was implied upfront would be a part of my detail job. This $65 quote was not on the original estimate, although it was notated they would clean the headlights. Not a fun time!

name: Paul Revy
text: Took my SUV to be detailed at the Bailey Cove location. They took a little longer than the estimated time to do the work, but the vehicle was immaculate when they were done. Recommended

name: Jeremy M
text: I have been using On the Spot Auto Detailing for the last few years.  The customer service has always been great and my vehicle has always been cleaned to perfection!

name: Vitaliy Didyk
text:
Terrible service,I've paid $150 and they didn't even vacuum under the seat or in the back of the trunk but did leave me with a nice dent on the door, they charge top $ to detail the car but seems to me like they don't even know the meaning of that word.
I would highly suggest not to go to that place?do it yourself you'll definitely do a better job and I promise you it won't take as long as it does with those guys

name: Richard Klimas
text:
Excellent business.
Professional, courteous and timely service.
My car didn’t look this good when I picked it up from the dealership, brand new !?!?!
Would highly recommend !!!!!
“ I’ll be back !!!!”

name: Brad McClellan
text: Not sure I'll be going back. The crevices aren't clean, the wax appears to have scratches that weren't there before

name: Forrest Tuttle
text: First time coming here and this place is amazing, I have never seen my car so clean!!!! This is the only place I will take my car for detail and washing for as long as I live in Huntsville.

name: Thomas Hatley
text:
Twice the attendant slammed my transmission into reverse while my car was moving forward.  After waiting in line for 20 minutes before my car was washed, another customer was allowed to pull up and have his car washed while he was sitting in it and mine was unattended.  I was in no hurry, and honestly don't believe saying anything would have gotten me anywhere.  After about an hour and 15 minutes, my car left only slightly cleaner than before it got there.

Simply put.  Avoid this place.  Believe me, I wish I would have.

Edit: I was at the Hughes Road in Madison location.  Cannot speak for the other one

name: Joe Pi
text:
I decided to have my vehicle detailed which they do for $199. I spoke with Brittney on the phone to get details of the work included and to make the appointment. To sum it up, everything except the engine! I made the appointment and wednesday was there at 8:30am as scheduled. No one was there. At approximately 9 am employees showed up and took my car. Inwas told that the credit card scanner wasn’t working so I would need to bring cash.

At 430 i called and was advised my car was done. When i got there I spoke with the man cleaning the exterior of my car. I asked if they cleaned the trunk jambs as I noticed a large deposit of mud when i got groceried the other day. He said yes. I then waited about 10 minutes for my car. I watched the man open the trunk and then wipe the trunk jambs...?

It was an overcast day and the car looked good... until I got home. My chrome exhaust was still black (i rubbed with my finger and it comes off), the fuel tank door was dirty (once again my finger lifted the dirt there), large spots on the chrome grill looked untouched, large spots on the lower door panels were untouched, smears on the windshield,and spots on the rims were untouched. I paid and their CC machine did work... amazing.

I have pictures and videos of all things I mentioned.

I was going to just leave it alone but knowing I paid $200 for a half a$$ job didn’t sit well with me.

I have to say the interior was GREAT! A little excessive with the oils but you can tell they took their time and got everything looking sharp!

On Friday i called and got Brittney on the phone again. I asked for a manager and she said she would relay a message for me. I told her I’m calling to complain about the detail I got... she asked for details and i told her everything. She called back a few hours later and advised that the owner/manager said i can bring the car back. I advised that i didnt have all day to leave my car to be washed and waxed again. (I highly doubt it was even waxed as there was so many spots that were unwashed... the wax would have stuck to it). I told her honestly the interior looked great and id be ok with paying for that service but need to be reimbursed for the remainder. She basically told me that wasnt an option and that thisnis how the manager handled things. He doesnt talk to customers and just has her. I explained that im offering to pay for the work that was done correctly... most customers would just want a total refund. However, if she cant authorize that and the manager wont even talk to me to settle the issue, ill just have my CC company cancel the payment.

I feel sad for Brittney as im sure she is put in this situation often.

My advice, stay away.

name: Leidy Aquino
text: On The Spot Is The Best Place to get your Auto detail ! I will definitely recommend them to everyone ! They will have your Vehicle looking Spotless! best customer experience ive ever had  !

name: Jeff Williams
text:
I wish I read read the reviews before buying.  I went to the small location on Hughes, and they did a horrible job on my car. I got the $60.00 "Supreme" wash. This is the first time I've paid to have my car cleaned and it will probably be the last.

There is a large section on my front bumper they missed. There was cleaning product pooled in my cup holders. It looked like they had just sprayed it on in places and never wiped it off. My dash and console was all spotty, and covered in a mix of dust and cleaning spray. They did not open my hatch and vacuum the back. The front was vacuumed but not well. There was a tone of very fine loose dirt  on my from floor mats. It looked like it came from the inside of the shopvac they used to vacuum the car. I can't believe they use a shopvac for this. I have leather seats, and they did not so much as wipe them down. My back seat had dirt in it from where I had sat a pair of boots. It's still there. There are little spots all over the outside of my car. I suspect that is from the spray wax they put on. I'm not sure.

The worst part is, my car has an odor now. It smells like body odor. I think that may be from the cleaning supplies they use. I don't know. I'm cleaning my car myself this week though. I've got to get the smell out. This place is horrible. I will never go back.

name: Jason Carter
text: Very friendly service. Fast and detailed. My car looks great!

name: Richard Ensley
text: This is the best detail job I have seen in along time, also their customer service was great.

name: Angela Whitlock
text: So I went to get my car seats and carpet shampooed (interior package). First of all, the package was 124.00!!! So right off the back I'm thinking they MUST be excellent at their job. I was sadly mistaken! I dropped the car off in the morning after making an appointment online. I asked the guy on duty about what time the car would be done. He said "about 1pm". I was cool with that. So I left and went to run errands. Around 1:30pm I called the place to find out the status. The woman who answered the phone put me on hold for over 5 min so I hung up and drove to the place to see how things were going. When I got there there was an older woman complaining about a previous job they did to her car. I just remember her saying "someone owes me 10 bucks to fix this". Anyway, one worker sees me and says "would you like to see your car?" I said yes and followed him into the garage. The car STILL had the dark brown stains on the carpets! Before I can point it out he says "I couldn't get it out. You should try dying the carpet." I was upset because the car also looked like they didn't vacuum well... if at all! Then there were dirt spots on my back window. The door jams were STILL dirty! The tires were dirty and the front bumper!  I ran my finger on both and lifted black dirt from those areas! They uses the wrong cleaning material on my middle console that caused paint to come off. I was very upset and dissatisfied snice I left it there for almost 6 hours already! I asked to speak with the manager. I told him this was no where near a good job for that price. After some deliberation, he agreed to knock off 25.00. This was a bit of a relief, but honestly, that was a 50.00 job (at best). THEN... about 2 hours later, that woman calls me back and says "your car is ready for pickup". I told her I already picked it up. She said "oh I guess I called the wrong person". I'm so annoyed with this place! They are so unorganized. Save your money and go elsewhere where they do a job that fits the amount that they are charging you. This was a waste of time. I would recommend Melvins On the Spot Car Wash in Florence, AL if you are in that area. He has had that business for 30 years! They know how to do it right and have better prices!

name: Pat Guettler
text: I won't take my car anywhere else. Great staff. Super attentive to detail.

name: john lang
text:
I read the reviews and was hesitant to buy a Groupon, but I'm pretty low maintenance, so I figured it would be fine. Nope.

3 hours turned in to 8 hours. We had scheduled a 9:00 appointment and I was on the road @ 5:05 after they completed the second car. Initially, they told me around 12:00. I had to kick up a fuss to even get them to begin after 3 hours.

They didn't vacuum the whole car until I asked them about it.

After I got home I discovered they hadn't even washed the roof of the SUV, much less waxed it.

While we were there they lost a center cap off of some guy's BMW. The best they could do was "sorry."

Even with a Groupon discount it was a waste of a day and not even worth the $130 I paid for two cars.

Dealing with these people was a nightmare from the get go, and now I'll have to spend more money to take my car elsewhere and have it washed and waxed properly. Do yourself a favor and stay away.

I have 3 cars but I have a 2005 Freestyle that I use for hauling things (like my dogs) and it is never all that clean but one day recently I was picking up one of my dogs after a bath (black haired dog) and they had forgotten to brush him out good and I had a ton of dog hair all in my car and it was overdue for a cleaning.  I took it to On-The_Spot and the guy offered me a price that I thought was too low so I made him come out and look at the mess and he added like $10.  The thing is when they got finished several hours later and I came to pick it up it looked like a freakin' miracle it was so clean (close to new car clean) so I gave them a $20 tip and paid the fee gladly since I could never have done it and even if I had tried to do it myself the finished product would have looked like trash in comparison to the job they did for me.  5 Star service in my book

Douglas C. Meeks
Amazon Top 500 ​VINE ​Reviewer, Goodreads Top 1% Reviewer, Reviewer for  Wicked Scribes and Kindle Book Review

One spot was on the fender no big deal. And the other was on the mirror. But then there’s one in the grille area that I’m gonna have to scrub now. I like this car wash it’s decently priced versus shine time on university but I’d rather pay $10 more for the top of the line car wash and have my car clean than to have to pay $10 less and not have it completely clean. I'll never go back to a drive-thru car wash again!

name: Jenna Nicole
text: Melvin’s was truly a very good surprise! After calling and no one answering for weeks looking for someone to detail both my husbands and my car, we were greated with a gentleman signing “melllvvvinns” on the phone. That has me immediately happy. He told us to be there by 10:30 this morning. We got there and they were busy but took both our cars, we traded them out, when one was done we brought the other one back. They had my husbands filthy car cleaned in 3 hours and had it looking shiny and brand new. I was shocked for them to get out all the years of stains and grime! I then gave them my car and was also pleased with the work. It was shiny as well and sparkling clean. The prices are truly AMAZING! If I was Melvin, I would UP those prices because it’s almost a steal for all the beautiful work they do. Mr. Melvin I learned is a Pastor and drives some miles to preach on Sunday mornings, he seems so happy and kind! I was very impressed, actually overly impressed with the work and the time it took. I hope everyone gives this place a real chance and they will truly be in awe. What a great find in the Shoals area. Wow!

name: Todd Frederickson
text:
Updated to 5 stars!: Long Lewis to the rescue. The reply I received from Long Lewis that explained everything. Thanks guys and gals!

Received a good wash today at long Lewis wash tunnel. I wish they offered interior cleaning services for customers. My car was clean but my wheels did not get clean. Overall it was a good experience and the manager hand dried my car himself which was nice.

resp.text:
Thanks, Todd, for taking time to leave a review!  We have good news that we hope will earn us that 5th Star! ; )
We actually do offer interior clean-up packages.  Instead of using the Auto Attendant, just stop in front on the booth and let the “Human Attendant” (who works in the booth) know that you want an “In & Out Package.”  The Attendant will put a small ticket on your dash that lets the guys & gals at the end of the Tunnel know exactly which “In & Out Package” you have purchased.  Our basic package includes wheel polishing. : )
We sincerely appreciate your kind words and your business!!

I highly recommend Long Lewis and will use them again for my future purchases.

Thank you Mr. Davis for the great review!  We are so pleased your buying experience was great!  That's what we always want to hear, but your review went to our Tunnel Wash listing  instead of the Dealership listing.  If you would like to leave a review for the Dealership, you may do so here:

resp.text: Ms. Roth – Thank you for taking time to provide this feedback.  We are terribly sorry you were disappointed with your service.  We would love the opportunity to re-clean your vehicle at no cost to you.  We could not locate contact information for you, so please reach out to John Folkwein, in the Car Wash, to schedule an appointment that is most convenient for you.  If John is unavailable, the Concierge will take your contact information and John will return your call.  Again, we hate that you were not completely satisfied, but look forward to making it up to you.

text: Terrible - Warn Everyone, RUN AWAY - Small hole in the tint the first time, I told them immediately, they said come back the Sunday. Sunday, they didn't show up, they called me back and said to come the Monday. Monday they said they were out of tint, I had to go buy my own so they would fix it. Well, this time they cut it too short and there is a gap at the bottom. They said come back Wednesday when they get tint in again. I just went there, they refused to fix it unless I pay them again. Blamed me for buying the wrong tint. I asked first, Advance Auto, they said yes and could have asked me to exchange in on Monday if there was a problem with it. The problem is HE cut it wrong, there is a gap at the bottom. He said he didn't have time to deal with this. Also, the other window also has scratches and a bubble at the bottom, but that seems really minor at this point.

name: Sarah Betz
text: My husband had my windows tinted at a birthday gift. There was lots of bubbles & debris between the glass and the tint on all the windows that were done. I took the vehicle back to be fixed within the 14 day replacement period. Upon arrival I entered the garage because the front door was locked and a sign on the door said to enter garage if door was locked. The owner was nice until I said I needed repairs done. At this time he started to yell at me and state that I was not allowed in the garage. He also said that there would always be bubbles and imperfections in the tint and that "nothing is perfect!". He refused to do any work to fix their mistake unless I paid more money and made an appointment for another day. He then threatened to call the cops on me when I said he should honor his work and make it right. Needless to say I left very upset and will NEVER do business with them again. Beware if you go to have work done!!

With that being said "Mr. Owner," it is almost mathematically impossible to that many unhappy customers without there being any validity and truth to what's being said. So, regardless of how well your business may or may not be doing, I strongly recommend that you listen to your consumers and work on how you treat the individuals that CHOOSE to grace you with their business and their money! ijs...

text: This place messed up my tint on my 2015 nissan. Left windows up for 5 days just to assure it was dry.. The drying was no problem for me as I have other cars to drive. Once I let tint down, very shocked. No the tint didn't slide because it's totally dry. The problem is the cutting is awful. Not Acceptable. I'm sure a 1st grader could cut better than this. I called the guy because this business has tinted other cars for me but when they was in the old building next door, He wasn't the one I did business with In past. No big deal, maybe I have came out  a day the boss is going to do my car instead of a worker. Talked good to get my payment... but now that I call him and ask that he look at my car when I bring down. He started screaming at me. And told me no you can't bring your car down, deal with it, do what you have to do... I was very shocked. Bad customer service and to be honest the way he was screaming. Anyone would be scared to take car down now. text: Worst place to go. My wife wanted her windows tinted professionally and got shade tree service. There were bubbles underneath the tint. The inside back rear window tint is hanging down  from where he tired to remove the bubbles by using some tool but, he only made it worst. The owner was very unprofessional and degrading. I wouldn't refer no one to the company. 1-Day Tint 1.4 miles West of University will be a much better choice. Especially if you want 100% Satisfaction and Great Customer Service.

name: Cameron Grace
text: I had windows tinted on May 29.  First indication I should have left was when the price in person increased from the phone price. I went ahead anyway.  They ran my vehicle the entire time while working (1 1/2 hrs) even after my request not to do so. Their explanation was the battery would discharge otherwise.  I have had numerous vehicles tinted and have never incurred this problem.  Upon inspection, many ares of small bubbles were noted.  They insisted they were water bubbles and said they would go away. I returned on June 4 to address the bubbles that remained.  The employee still insisted they were air bubbles and to give a few more days.  I returned on June 13 (my next opportunity).  The man in charge asked for my receipt and said that I was past my warranty for replacement and there was nothing he would do.  I would not recommend this shop simply because they do not stand behind their work.  I had returned (June 4) within the warranty time frame (14 days) and they sent me away insisting the problem would go away.  The problem remains.  All they want is your money, not your business.  I wish I would have received the same service the other review received.  Go elsewhere!

name: Henry Seright
text: This was the worst experience I have ever had at any automotive accessory shop. On 3 July I took my GS350 to have the tint removed from my rear glass and have it replaced with ceramic tint that I purchased from tintzoom online for $200.00. When I arrived the owner and I agreed on a price of $190.00 to do all window with the exception of the left front and left rear (I had already installed it) with the tint I supplied. Having done over 50 tint jobs at a reputable local shop while in college (10 years ago) I know the proper way of installing tint, but being a little rusty I decided to take it to a professional to ensure the tint was removed properly (Steamer or Ammonia and Black Bag). After pulling the car into the shop to start the job I noticed the CARWASH DETAILER with a razor blade hacking at the tint in the rear window. I immediately asked him to stop and asked the owner to take over before he ruin the rear glass defroster. I then left with my ride that was waiting (big mistake) and had him take me to the bank to get cash for the job.  When I returned my car was supposedly ready. I looked at my rear package and it was covered with tint scrapings and my defrost lines were no longer black they were gold (as in no longer working from scraping with a razor). I also noticed that my 3rd brake light was torn to pieces, and there were several pieces of tint left on the window with new film laid on top of it. Soon after I spoke with the manager to inform him of my displeasure with the services rendered. The first thing I asked the owner about was my 3rd brake light and his answer was “We had to break it to put the film on.” The second was my defroster his response was” We had to get the tint off.” The third issue with this humbling experience was the patches of old tint eft on the window with new tint installed over it, in which I received no response from the owner. My response to the owner was “I am not paying for this,” so he decided to vacuum some of the tint from the rear package tray and reduce the price to $165.00 since he broke my $250.00 3rd brake light. After I still refused to pay we both called the police (Little did he know I was on the phone with a good friend who is deputy chief of police). So between the times the police arrived he decided to rip the tint off the windows and throw my $200.00 ceramic tint in the trash, despite his wife warning him not to. When the police arrived he lied about ripping the tint off and even said I didn’t bring any tint to him and stated that he supplied the tint. After looking at the car the officer asked why is there just tint on the driver side windows, I stated that is because those were the windows I did myself. To end the story the officers did nothing (OF COURSE) and stated it was a civil matter which is probably true. Long story short I am out $568.49 to replace the rear glass to get my defrosters back (plus installation), $200.00 for the ceramic tint that he decided to rip from the window and throw in the trash, and $250.00 for my 3rd brake light the he tore up. PLEASE do not go to the poor established called Customized Auto Detail & Window Tinting or you will receive a humbling experience like mine.

I then called the number on front of the building and this Tyrone character answered. This fool said "you should have just walked in the front and asked for help". I told him I did they told me to wait on you. I went back into garage they told me to wait again. Then this idiot Tyrone called me back 3 times! "Get the f@$k out my shop" blah blah. name: Damion Lopez
text: I usually don’t leave reviews but was too impressed! I have a 2020 Ram 1500. I had some surface scratches/scuffs from rubbing up against some dry brittle yet hard bushes. I called around a few places for quotes and without getting into pricing I’ll just say these guys did it for close to half of my best quoted price. Was also told (from other places) it would take a matter of days and did not have any weekend availability till March. I use my truck for work so this was not possible. Quality Car Care came highly recommended by a friend of mine who runs a collision center. I called on Friday and was told to drop the car off on Sunday. I dropped it off at 8am and was called to pick it up at 2pm. The work was stellar. They even got off some tree sap that 2 other car wash places was unable to remove. Again I never leave reviews but these guys are the real deal and people need to know about places like this especially at such a trying time for small businesses. Truly one of the few (if not only) places that actually deliver a great product for a bargain price. I will never take my vehicle anywhere else.

text: The place is just awesome!

name: Diverse Productions - Cinematic Videography
text: VERY friendly staff and the owner was very professional. I got the ceramic tint on all of the windows and mirrors, the partial detail, and the ceramic coating for my car and it looks absolutely stunning! They did a wonderful job and I highly recommend getting your car done here if you want to protect and future proof your investment like I did.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Le! We appreciate your business!

name: Rachel Guthrie
text: Love how my kid hauler looks inside & out after Elite Car Spa gets a hold of it🔥🔥

resp.text: Thank you for your review and your business!

name: Ebony Pearson
text: I brought my black vehicle in with swirl/scratches covering most of the body. It looks showroom perfect again! Jeremy is knowledgeable and efficient with a keen eye for detail. He explained the processes involved and took the time to answer all of my questions. The Elite Car Spa staff is both friendly and accommodating-excellent customer service. I am a very pleased customer.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business!

name: Shari Blanton
text: I just wish I had used them sooner. They made my car look new again and it’s 15 years old.  Very friendly folks.  The owner was very nice.  I stayed and waited.  Time passed quick.  Wendy was very pleasant to talk to.  I will definitely go back again.  Thanks for being so accommodating and doing such a good job cleaning up my car.

resp.text: Thank you Shari! We appreciate your business and enjoyed having you in the office. Look forward to your next visit.

name: Haley Groover Steward
text: LOVE THIS PLACE! Had the ceramic tint put on the windows to keep it cooler in the summer, and a ceramic coating put on the car after they washed it. They did a great job on the inside as well! I am so excited, my car looks GREAT!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your business.

name: Amanda Kilgo
text: Me and my husband had our cars tinted here.  Great friendly staff! Wendy was so friendly and very knowledgeable about my new tint.  My windows look great! Thank you for doing a wonderful job on both our new cars!

resp.text: Thank You! We appreciate your business!

name: Bethany Courville
text: Excellent experience with Elite! I drove from Jacksonville and will continue to do so. They cleaned my filthy car and it looks like new! The price is so reasonable and they were very professional. They even sanitized my keys before returning them to me!

resp.text: Thank you Bethany! We appreciate your business!

name: Ian Lee
text:
I was a first time customer and I will probably end up messing up my car again just to receive the great service and attention to detail all over again.
I must have driven by a million times on my way to school and was always curious as to how great the service was. Spoiler alert: Fantastic.
Wendy is very welcoming and professional. Jeremy is a very charming and polite man. I know this because I spent all day in the lobby with them. They absolutely deserve the two awards on the wall and I will be completely floored if they don't win a third one this year.
I cannot recommend Elite Car Spa enough. Fantastic people. Amazing service.

resp.text: Ian, we appreciate your business and would love to have you back anytime! Thank you for choosing Elite Car Spa.

name: Brittany Laney
text: Excellent customer service. Quality work for the price! Highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Brittany! We appreciate your business!

name: Joey Statum
text: The best window tint ever! Quality at it's best. You get what you pay for. Great job! Thanks guys 😊

resp.text: Thank you Joey! We appreciate your business.

name: gage
text: $200 interior only detail and they didn't touch the center console.

name: Ally Morrison
text: Great job on detailing 2 of our cars and tinting the windows on 1. Very fair pricing!!!

resp.text: We appreciate your business! Thank you for choosing Elite Car Spa for your vehicle detailing and tint needs.

name: John Christopher Adams
text: I bought a new car and decided to be a weekend warrior and tint my tail lights. Needless to say, it didn’t end well. Elite picked up my car, dropped it back off, and has it looking like new. I highly recommend them. It’s hard to find service this good now days!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We appreciate your business and we're ready for your Jeep on your next visit.

name: Chane Wallace
text: Elite Car Spa is the best auto detail shop in the area. I use my truck for work and it gets extremely dirty. Im always throwing tools around and tracking mud in. I take it up to these guys and looks like it did when I first bought it. They've always been very a accommodating and the owner, ladies in the office, and detail crew are all very friendly. I know they cringe when they see my vehicle but I certainly appreciate them.

resp.text: Thank you Chane. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again!

name: Kylie Luttrell
text: My car looks fantastic! Super easy pick up and drop off from my workplace. Excellent customer service. The girls in the office were terrific and very accommodating.

resp.text: Thank you Kylie! We appreciate your business! It was a pleasure. Our ladies in the office are definitely on their A game!

name: Destin morrison
text: Great customer service!!

resp.text: Thank you Destin! We appreciate your business.

name: Ashley Morgan
text: Excellent work. Looks like a brand new car. Super friendly staff and owner. Great value. Several convenient locations. My go-to gift for my dad.

resp.text: Thank you Ashley! We appreciate your business!

name: Jaime Moses
text: Hands down, the best car detailing service in the county. Had my car looking brand new in under an hour! Super friendly and accommodating, they have a new customer for life!

resp.text: Thank you Jamie! We appreciate your business and look forward to your next visit.

name: S Colbert
text:
I was a first time customer to Elite Car Spa. I took my vehicle here as recommended by a trusted friend. I purchased the highest level service they provided (well over $200), a "full detail" as they said. I had my vehicle there a full day with no pressure to have it done at any certain time, as i wouldn't be able to pick it up until i was out of work, well after they had closed. Upon arrival to pick it up, I was immediately concerned. It seemed as if they overlooked quite a few obvious areas. The front-end still had smashed insects and debris on it that easily came off with my fingernail. That lead me to look even closer. Using a flashlight, I noticed quite a few areas where wax was never removed, where hopefully condensation, and not unrinsed soap, dripped down, leaving behind hazy but obvious lines across the paint. The interior of my vehicle was outstanding, with the exception of the entire front winshield being ignored and unclean. I am just disappointed. I apologize in !
advance for not having enough faith in this shop to bring my vehicle back there, even for them to correct these issues. I do believe that this may be the best place in town for a basic car wash, but i would not reccomended them to someone expecting expertly trained, skillful, adept work or to even get what they paid for. Even if they in fact paid for the best the have to offer.

resp.text:
We're sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the services provided.
There are several issues you addressed. Unfortunately, we dont have an S.Colbert in our customer database making it difficult to know what vehicle you are referring to and unable to review your account.
We're glad you were pleased with the interior work done in your vehicle. As for exterior work, bugs can etch into your clear coat and without having your vehicle buffed it would seem rough. Picking up your vehicle at night, when condensation builds up, does make it difficult to see.  Not to say there wasn't an issue as we are human. However, we pride ourself on our work and professionalism.
We love feedback from our customers. On rare occasions when a customer is not satisfied we do go above and beyond to make sure to rectify any issues. It is unfortunate you don't feel comfortable enough to bring your vehicle back to us as we would have done everything we could to make sure you were 100% satisfied.
We are far more than a basic car wash and our staff is trained and quite skilled.
We hope you call and give us an opportunity to rectify this situation.

name: Ivonne Joiner
text: Always excellent service and very friendly staff. Great car detailing and tinting.

resp.text: Thank you Ivonne! We appreciate you and your family's business!

name: Wendy Wallace
text: Fantastic ppl. They do great work both detailing and window tinting on your car or boat. They even have gift cards! Highly recommend! Make sure to call ahead for your appointment.

resp.text: Thanks Wendy! We appreciate you and your families business.

name: Ariel Brooks
text: Extremely friendly staff all around. And they did an excellent job on my boyfriends car. It was a surprise for him for Valentine’s Day and he loved it. Got the wash, wax, and inside done and everything looks like the day we got the car!

resp.text: Thank you Ariel! We're glad he enjoyed  his Valentine's Day present. We appreciate your business.

name: Zane Sullivan
text: They did a super job tinting the windows on my f150. Very professional and friendly folks. Highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Zane! We appreciate your business.

name: Nathan Martin
text: Great service.. top notch employees

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Martin! We appreciate your business.

name: Miley Stansell
text: They did a wonderful job on my SUV. Very impressed with their work.

resp.text: Thank you Judy! We appreciate your business.

name: Destin morrison
text: Great customer service!!

resp.text: Thank you Destin! We appreciate your business.

name: David McBurnett

text: Came in on a Sunday morning to handle a wash out for me. Took their time, used soap and acid to clean out the chicken juice. 45 dollars out the door.

name: Dispatch Multi
text:
Quick $45 washout.
Donald did extra job and went next door to wake up my driver.
Thank you !

name: Matilda Bishops

name: Michael Smith
text: Very nice people did a good job on my washout

name: Brent S.
text: Small 2 bay truck wash. Wash Outs performed outside. $50.00 Wash Out. Very reasonable since they worked on it for about 1 hour. Very dirty from mechanically separated chicken parts. Offered more money because of extra work, they politely turned it down. Fantastic wash out, wonderful employees.

name: J B
text: Good people!

name: Jason Griggs
text: I come in Everytime IAM in the area always top notch

name: Brandon Turner
text: Those guys did a top notch job I was in and out well pleased I will definitely be back

name: Madison Tims
text: They are the best all the workers are good  especially kasey Tims she’s the best office lady all the other ones are ok and Kenneth Tims is a really good worker so is Donald Mosley and John crow they are some good workers

name: Shawn Connell
text: They at best washed at the truck
