name: abubaker ahmed
text: Nice wash out

name: jennifer scavo
text: Excellent car wash, excellent employees.  Greeted at the entrance, cleaned and sprayed at truck before going into the wash...automatic wash with cloth, touch brushes. Upon exit you have unlimited use of the vacuums, cleaning and drying rags, a vehicle floor mat cleaning machine...if you want it, it's here. I seldom skimp and go to any other wash. Just wait until good and dirty and make a great visit of it. Feels like a million bucks when all done here. It's great...NEVER DISAPPOINTS!

name: Ty Hunt
text:
There was a young man named Keegan working 5/16/2017. My membership pass wasn't working, and I paid for a wash. I expressed them to him, and he immediately took care of everything. Very thorough and professional. People like him are why I keep coming back. Great job, and a great wash.
*this was the Super Sonic wash in Muscle Shoals*

name: Janna Mangrum
text: Loved this business. Not as happy with the business that came in behind them.

name: Jason Laurence
text: Stay away from this car wash.   Went in with dirty but flawless truck.  No dents no scratches.   Came out with a dented tailgate on my dodge ram.   Of course workers didn't believe it.  But when u feel your truck get pulled backwards inside the car wash you know something happened.   And I think I know my truck very well.  I know that dent wasn't there when I went in.   Again.  Stay away from this car wash.

name: Kevin Balch
text: Friendly staff always courteous and willing to help. You do have to ask if you need help though. Update...9/2017 after several visits I must say service here has become dismal. The carwash hardly cleans the car anymore. I leave and still have spots all over my car.

name: Chase
text:
Hope nothing on your car gets damaged when you are at the wash. A free wash is all you get offered. Not even an apology. Apparently under new ownership and has poor management.

Will not use again!

name: Jerry Green
text: Was a very good place to get car wash but now the last few times I have been there.  You really got to wipe your car good if you want it to look good.

name: Grindminion
text: Sometimes, you don't have the money to outright get a wash on a car (or water leaks into your door) and you just need a vacuum that will work. Advertising them as free when you can't use it until you pay the $6 is ridiculous. I didn't have enough quarters for the vacuums at other places, and this was my last resort to just vacuum my car.

name: Marcus James
text: Great place to get your car wash.

name: Chelsea Rae Henry
text: I love this car wash! I've never noticed a scratch or dent from it and it's always very convenient. It always gets my car nice and clean, even the wheels!

name: Pam Givens
text: Great vacuum and we went back through when a couple of spots didn't come off the first time.

name: Arnell Austin
text: Best automatic car wash in Petersville location

name: Jason Yeager (Jason)
text: It is a decent car wash. I like how they provide free towels for you to wipe down your vehicle while you're utilizing the free vacuums.

name: Tim Gee
text: Great friendly service... my SUV didn't get cleaned very well in one pass and manager let me take thru second time... whisk worked perfectly.. I go there when in Florence

name: curtis moon
text: Car wash was okay provided towels at the vacuum area which was nice, I asked the attendant if he would put some soapy water on a scrub pad to get the bugs off the front of my car his response was "are you trying to get me fired? If I do it for you I'll have to do it for everyone" so I guess customer service is at the bottom of their list.

name: Dena Wilson
text: Easy access and fast. Free vacuums with wash. Lots of wash options.

name: Sidney Smith
text: Absolute best car wash in the Florence area, no matter how expensive your car happens to be.

name: Clayton Grider
text: Always have trouble here.  Wash does not clean very well and they give you a hard time for wiping where the wash did not do the job.  Had this problem more than once.  Not likely to ever go back.

name: Jackson Townsend
text: There is still dirt all over my car. Also, I googled “touchless car wash”, and this came up as an option. This car wash isn’t touchless. That can be fixed with better SEO by this business. Ultimately, for an $18 experience, I would’ve rather just driven around with a dirty car.

name: Jeff McCrary
text: Quick, easy, and "free" vacuums. Basic wash is $6 and it goes on up from there.

name: Barbara Tubbs Hill
text: Great way to keep the car clean and spiffy!

name: Sinnerella
text: My SUV came out with filthy wheels. And places all over that were still showing dirt.

name: Matt Gargis
text: Their website says a basic wash is $6 and that towels are provided, but it is actually $7 and there were no towels. The free vacuum is kinda nice, I guess.

name: Drew Newell
text: Good car wash with a friendly staff.

name: Geno Brown
text: Terrible wash overpriced they have no towels for the consumer to wipe the car with which I think is totally ridiculous had I known this before I paid my $20 for my car wash I would not have gone in I would have gone elsewhere this establishment has gone down since the previous owner I do not recommend it as the wash does not clean your car very well and there are no services.

name: Janet Tatum
text: They have a brush sitting there but don't scrub the bumper like other places do. Had to wipe the bugs off myself.

name: Brandi Fletcher
text: It didn't get all of the bug guys off from my car, but they provide plenty of clean detailing towels and free vacuums. Probably not worth the cost...

name: Kenneth
text: Fast

name: anthony givens
text: Drive to Supersonic and wash that thang.

name: Jenette Vandiver
text: Bird poop still on car, no one sprayed it first!! Also I could not find anyone so I could run it through again. Little pricey to have to wash again at home... Wont be back, not the first time this has happened.

name: Marc Patterson
text: Always great!

name: Christopher Moore
text: Average Car wash experience. Not the best in town.

name: Edward L Peeden
text: Does a great job

name: Kenneth
text: Fast

name: John Williams
text: They have detailed 4-5 of my cars and all have come out outstanding! They have done inside outside perfectly and could not ask for any better! I will continue to bring them my cars and recommend that everyone do the same!

resp.text: Thank you very much!

name: James Janes
text: McAllister’s is absolutely awesome. My wife’s car was really dirty inside and out including greasy spots on both front seats. Both seats look like new in fact the outside looks new as well.  Friends this not just a car wash and wax job this is a professional auto detail. I have had friends spend twice what I did and not get this nice of a job.

resp.text:
Thank you very much.
We Shine you when you Shine!

name: Shuntel Curry
text:
This is Sherrel McCord
I am always satisfied with the work that is done. They keep my car shinning like new.

resp.text: Thank you very much. You are a valued customer.

name: Ray Morgan
text: Awesome detailing. Saves us time by coming to the dealership to do the detailing.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Troy Scott
text: Awesome Man saved me from heading back to Louisiana with a flithy truck. Awesome job hardworking crew. Would not use anyone else. Will definitely repeat my business when in the area. Thanks for a spectaculor job.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your favorable review.

name: clarence jordan
text: Was pleasantly surprised... had no complaints! Left feeling like I made the right decision 😉

name: Kelly Whippo
text: Car wash was quick and efficient, but now my car is covered in hard water stains!! Disappointed :(

name: Greg Barlow
text: Don't expect much,not detailed oriented at all. Must have been a rock in their rag to clean windows. My tint is scratched very bad. And also so much tire goop on my tires I had to wash the truck when I got home. Pelham location

name: Brett Frank
text: It's a carwash,what else?  Tipped folks to pay special attention during prewash, a complete waste of money.

name: Nancy Jones
text: Still feel like a kid when I go through

name: Edward Brown
text: The service is great, top notch no other car can match. Thanks for all y'all do!!!

name: Robert North
text: No questions asked best car wash in alabama. I take lots of pride in my vehicles and they take care of mine like it's their own as well as make you feel like family! Lots have tried but no one has succeeded like Anthony's. Great family owned business that's been around since I was a kid (25) years! Trust me.

name: Austin Hood
text: Wash and vacuum was good but the last couple times I've been there I have to point out several places that need to be wiped down. Today it was inside the door, outside bottom of the seat area, and had to open the trunk for them to wipe water away from outside (had to point it out 2x cause he just wiped part of it). I'll continue to use but some of the younger fellas need a couple lessons on wiping and cleaning interior.

name: Debbie Alexander
text: The staff was very nice and helpful. I guess before I tipped them $10 I should have looked at inside of car. Ashes all in the door and under seat area. Uggg should have just done it myself

name: Kayla Abrams
text: LOVED IT! The employees and etc are just great! They go the extra mile for their customers. My husband and I have used this company and very location multiple times and we have never experiencred any issues at all.. We always leave happy and with a smile and we always come back! We are always treated with great respect and etc.

name: Eddie James
text: Always get a great wash at a good price. The vacuums have a lot of power to get the job done quickly.

name: Andy
text:
This was probably my 10th time to use Anthony's Cash Wash in Pelham. Always been good. Especially if you get the Executive Clean.  The guys wipe down "everything". Looks like a showroom vehicle afterwards.   I've also done self-vacuuming  and wipe down. All the facilities made it as easy as it could be.
I'll be back for 11, 12, 13 . . . . . .

name: Benita Johnson-Smith
text:
I talked with the manager to explain to him what type of car wash I wanted . I told him I wanted a hand wash outside and inside my SUV, car vacuumed inside. He assured me that would  be done. I was surprised  when they finished 30 minutes later,.  I thought that was strange to finish so quickly.  The final product was very badly  done. The outside still had signs of dirt on all the car doors, the bumper on the car was not washed, and the inside still had food drums and had not been washed but half wiped with a dry rag. I paid $60.00 for the was and a $5.00 tip.
I am completely unsatisfied with the quality of the service and work. I expected a better quality  of service after paying  that amount for a car wash.  I can wash my vehicle and it looks way  better than what I received yesterday at Anthony's.  I had to re-wash my car this morning. This is the second time I received terrible  service at this particular  car wash. I will not be recommending this car wash to any of my friends  or family. I am extremely  disappointed  in the quality of work  and service I have received.  I WILL NOT BE RETURNING  TO ANTHONY'S CAR WASH EVER!! YOU HAVE GOTTEN ALL THE MONEY YOU WILL EVER RECEIVE FROM ME FOR THIS TERRIBLE CAR WASH!!!!!!!

name: Leanne Dillard
text: I’ve been going there for every month for years and since covid they changed the pricing and the way the system is set up it doesn’t make sense...  so today I paid $20 for a wash that I could get down the street for $7. Very disappointing that they raised the price with out notice and now I would have to pay $45 for the same service I paid $30 for three months ago. I’m not sure I will go there again.

resp.text:
Hi Leanne

Thanks for your feedback.  We are sorry that we have disappointed you.  We have not changed any of our pricing since Covid.  We did disable our full service option until we felt confident that our staff was safe.  We are going to add our full service option back to our kiosks 5/22/20.  This is the only logistical change that we have made this year.  Our full service washes did receive a $10 price increase last year due to supplies and material costs increase.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

Thanks
Chris Serio

name: Amanda G
text: Went there for the first time yesterday. I normally use a different place, but wanted to try Anthony's out. I paid $45 for the full service works which was supposed to be to clean the outside AND inside. They did a terrible job, but I didnt have time to check before I left because I had to be somewhere. They did not clean my windows, I had water spots on all my windows and windshield. I had water spots all over the car where they didnt dry it off. And it looks like they did to the inside was vacuum the floorboards. Nothing was wiped down like they advertised they would do. My cup holders were all still dirty, none of my seats were vacuumed, and they did absolutely nothing in the very back of my SUV. The other place I go to is half the price and they do everything. I was very disappointed in the the quality and price of Anthony's and will never be back and would never recommend them to anyone.

name: Michael
text: I always wash my own car but I decided to go here the other day and I'll definitely be back. Amanda at the desk was so helpful and sweet. Great customer service goes a long way with me so I'll definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you Michael!  We look forward to serving you again in the future!

name: Sassy Savins
text: JUST left this location- was my first time going through a full service wash.  I was a little hesitant and honestly nervous I was going to do something wrong but I now know that nervousness was unnecessary!  The signage told me exactly where to go, the computer prompting was very easy to understand, and for $35 I got an excellent drive through wash, some helpful guidance from the attendant who was both smiling and friendly, and then pulled up to the full service area.  The gentleman there told me exactly where to park and were very efficient about pointing out the waiting area without being rude.  The detailing was done in RECORD time and I gotta say- my car hasn’t looked or smelled this good since I bought it years ago!  I don’t know what you pay these guys but I can assure you it’s not enough as they were the most thorough, efficient, and friendly bunch!  I’m no longer a business owner but if I were I wouldn’t hesitate to snatch them up and have them working for me!  Treat them well as they are such an asset to your team!  Thank you guys for an awesome experience and though I live an hour away, you’ve made a repeat customer out of me!  Btw, the blue sky air deodorizer was recommended to me and it smells amazing!

name: JOSE RODRIGUEZ
text:
I paid $45 for full service, really bad job  And dirty,  Also only 2 guys. Bye
* Thank you for nothing, I'm never coming back *
5/11/20 5:46 PM

name: Peggy Wright
text: Great service.  Jimmy was very helpful.

name: Kimberly R
text: Please don’t waste your money!! I believe in giving everyone a chance and I’m not one to leave a review good or bad but after 2 times of having to go back and make them re-clean my car I’m done!!! Sloppy at best!!!! If I wanted to clean my car myself I would not spend 30$ of my hard earned money ! But I have learned my lesson.

name: Tracy Sorrow
text: When I called they were very helpful.

name: Brandon Snyder
text: Dedicated guys and consistently doing a great job!!

name: Deborah Tombrello
text: Great service as always.

name: Bham Local Guide
text: Go to the Hoover location instead.

name: Nikaveli ThaWhitePantha
text: My car looks amazing and the employees are really friendly and willing to listen...

name: Quincy Stafford
text: Very dissatisfied with one worker who really did not want to clean or show any professionalism

name: Darryl Peterson
text: This is my car wash of choice now.  Everyone was helpful and friendly.  The inside lobby and bathrooms are spotless.  However, the service was so fast, I did not get to enjoy it for long.  I did not get a great wash the first time; but I was contacted by Chris Serio immediately after posting my review and he made it right.  Anthony's has a "we will make it right" guarantee and a two day "rewash if it gets dirty" guarantee.  I did not get a perfect car wash, but it is better than any other I have had in town.  And maybe if get my car washed more often, I won't be able to tell the difference between perfect and near perfect.

resp.text:
Hi Darryl

Thanks for your honest review!  We apologize for not doing our job and giving you the level of quality that you paid for and deserve!  We will be glad to make this right with you and make sure your satisfied.  Please contact me when you have a moment.

Thanks
Chris Serio
chris@anthonyscarwash.com

name: Sonya Holt
text: Love this establishment! Excellent customer service with each visit.

resp.text: Thank you Sonya!

name: DJ RaptorXS
text: I bought the $35 Full Service wash and don't feel like I got my money's worth.  My vinyl floor mats were still considerably dirty after being "cleaned."  My tire rims still had dirty spots on them, and tire protectant was applied in a visibly uneven fashion, giving my tires a persistent partially wet appearance.  Finally, dried pollen was still visible in my truck bed.  For "Full Service,"  I expected better.  Honestly, it's much cheaper to find a self-service stall, pump in quarters, and do your own cleaning.

resp.text:
Hi DJ

Thanks for your feedback!  We do not have any record of you bringing our mistake to our attention.  We stand behind our services and guarantee satisfaction, which means when we make a mistake we will always make it right.  As far as pollen goes there is nothing we can do with the environment.  Pollen is all in the air and will cover your vehicle as well as your bed before we can possibly complete your vehicle.

Thanks
Chris Serio
chris@anthonyscarwash.com

name: Sonya Holt
text: Love this establishment! Excellent customer service with each visit.

resp.text: Thank you Sonya!

name: Teresa Moore
text: They were awesome

name: Megan Morton
text: I LOVE this location. The guys do an awesome job when I pay for full service which is pretty often. Igo back and forth beteee doing it myself or having them knock it out if I am in a hurry. Today I did the work myself which is a tough task if you are a perfectionist like me. Derrick and Terry came over and helped me even though I didnt pay for full service. These guys work hard and are very professional! I always recommend Anthony's to friends and family. Thanks for being awesome at what you do!

resp.text: Thank you Megan!

name: JERRY ROPER
text:
I usually don't do this but, I paid $37 for the "managers special " full service car wash. They spent 5 min wiping the car off, sprayed on tire shine and sent me on my way. Truck still has dirty spots all over it. May be a good car wash, but don't waste your money on the "full service".

Not Satisfied....it was better when it was Johns Car wash.  First and last time going there!

name: Helen Bliss
text: I called Anthony's up asking for an interior cleaning for my car-- we'd had a few spills and stains on the seats and I was desperate to get them out.  They were helpful, friendly, and kind.  The car looked amazing inside and out when I picked it back up later that day, the stains were gone, not a detail was missed, and they were still extremely friendly the entire way through.  I'm thrilled with the service we had.

text: Alec was my cashier tonight and he was friendly despite being extremely busy. He has a line basically out the door and was scrambling to refill quarters as fast as possible. name: Heath Estes
text: I spent over five hundred dollars getting diesel fuel here and the cashier asked me if I would like a coffee and I said sure. I'm guessing it was a complimentary offer since I spent so much. Well I get one and as I'm walking out she stops me and says I have to pay for it because I didn't get the right size. Really? Mind you she didn't say I had to get a certain size, I just grabbed a cup not paying attention to the exact size.I got a medium instead of a small. So that's like what a 4 once difference? We're going to make a fuss over that? Really???I should have just set it down but I went ahead and paid for it anyways. To me that's not how you should treat a customer.  But whatever I wont be back. I will take my business elsewhere.

resp.text: Hi there, thank you for letting us know and we are sorry about your experience. We have passed on your message to our local management team.

name: Peyton Hunter
text: Long story short this was the worst experience I have ever had at ANY place of business in my life, not just a car wash. I have never been so disrespected. I don’t know the manager here’s name but he does not deserve a job at this place and I’m sure if the owner knew how he acted towards customers he wouldn’t. My car was damaged while entering the car wash due to this guy (the manager) guiding me in Completely crooked. As soon as I got out I noticed the damage. When I approached him and said something about it he just exploded. I’ve never seen someone get so defensive. This whole time I was being calm and respectful. He knew he was in the wrong and immediately started trying to shift the blame to me. I could tell the guy obviously had some issues and decided to just leave. I said “don’t even worry about it. It’s fine” Well this is when things took a weird turn. He immediately started cursing me up and down referring to me as “you people” telling me I was trying to set him up for money and calling me a liar. I could not believe how aggressive this guy was being and just how he was reacting in general all because I called him out for his wrong doings. As I was getting in my car to get the heck away from this crazy guy, he was still yelling about how I had scratches on all my rims and that I couldn’t prove it happened then. (Even though I could prove it. He just didn’t know that.) I just wanted to leave at that point. I mean I have never in my life been treated in such a way. This guy does not deserve to have a job. I can’t imagine if it was my grandma or somebody else that he was treating like that. Also they don’t “give out names” at this business, as I could not get the managers name that damaged my car nor the owners name. Maybe it’s just me but that seems a bit shady. I would not recommend going here but if you do and your car is damaged, just be prepared to be completely disrespected and profiled by them as a scam artist.

name: ronnie dumas
text: I purchased an unlimited wash package for $22.75 a month, whenever i get a chance to go the customer service representatives are always negligent an unhelpful. They dont operate during there advertised hours and you cant get in contact with anyone to cancel your subscription

name: Destini Robinson
text: I go here to get my car washed now. It's a man that work here that I really like, wish i knew his name, but I like this place so far. I get the most experience car wash , its called the supersonic wash. I go there a lot because I got the unlimited pass so I pay 29.99 a month , and I can go as I please. I went last Sunday and there was a different guy there. When he came out he had a attitude,and when I pulled my car around so he could wash it down before I went through the carwash. He pushed one of my rear view mirrors in now I have a button inside my car where you just push and they go up, so I know for a fact he used a little force to get them to close because you don't push my mirrors in period. Now I let it go, but what if he would've broken my mirror? Like, I really dont have time for angry people, so I hope he's never there when I do get my car washed again.

text: I love this place. The fact that you can pay a monthly fee and wash your car as many times as you want. This place is changing the expectations of car washes. I'm definitely a supporter.

Very much worth a clean ride do the math

Blue beacon on most of them are

resp.text: Ronnie sorry for the late response; but I am thankful for the positive review!  Sunday, I like to give them a rest, so we can be up and running come Monday!  Thank you for your support and hope to do business with you again~

name: Dennis Blumer
text: 6 people working and 6 begging for tips before it was even done! I tipped them but I won’t go back there! Dusty gravel drive to get out! These pics show job well done.....well...job done!

resp.text: Dennis, sorry to hear about your experience you had back in 2018.  You guys spoke and we listened.  We moved in 2019 - still exit 42 - right off the exit. If you ever around, stop by.   Usually we are ready to serve you w/ absolutely no waiting!  Hopefully we will be of service to you again.

name: J-rod Carriers
text: I generally don’t like independent truck wash places, often takes too long but these guys are good, quick and good. Will definitely come back

resp.text: J-Rod Carriers - this is what we like to hear!  We appreciate your feedback and we thank you for allowing us to service you.  Hope to see you again.

name: Sheldon Williams
text: Stop by to get my truck wash dirt and gravel driveway going in-and-out. They took about 10 minutes to watch the truck. I had to go to the gas station to rinse off the chemicals from the side. I'll never go there again nor do I recommend them. This by far was the worst truck wash I have been to.

resp.text:
Williams thank you for taking time to express your concern regarding your wash today.  With each wash, we try to do a walk through to ensure we didn't miss any spots and we encourage our patrons to do the same.  As you noted, we got you in and out within 10mins, if you would of called - I would of had the boys to clean you back off, in no time.
Sorry we didn't meet your expectations; but we wish you safe travels out there buddy.

name: matthew poll
text: I visited this truck wash today at 4pm, there were 4 guys on duty. I drive a motor coach. I kicked up a bunch of dust and dirt as I pulled into the lot as I was moving faster than I should have. There was no wait, no other vehicle in the bay. By the time I had walked over to the office, paid for the wash, and walked back over to the bus they were done. I was charged $50, which I thought was fair. Owner even offered to rinse me off if I get dusty between now and the football game on Saturday. I will definitely be back. I drove off really slowly and didn’t kick up any dust. Owner said it’s been dry and he needs to water the gravel driveway area.

name: V.I. Cowboy
text: The guys did a great job on my reefer at a reasonable price.

resp.text: Clifford, we are glad to have your support!  I'll make sure to share it with the guys!  See you soon!

name: Brad Driver
text: They washed my engine compartment, and permanently damaged my ecm. I will never return

resp.text: Brad sorry to hear about your ECM.  We didn't wash out any engines today.  So unsure of when or how this happen to you.  As we both know, an ECM doesn't get damage that easily (permanently) with one wash.  Sounds like you were having trouble beforehand. A wet ECM/filter may cause a crankcase pressure code - but usually goes away within a couple of miles - not permanently damage buddy.  Thanks for your review.  Hope to have your business again in the future.

name: John Neely
text: Great wash

resp.text: Neely thank you for letting us service you!  We appreciate the 5-star rating!  We hope to see you again soon.  Be safe

name: Jeffrey Chailland
text: Awesome washout, friendly employees

resp.text: Hey Jeffrey!  Glad to have serviced you.  Thanks for the review.  We hope to see you again!

name: Lee McKee
text: The are priced fairly. They do a great job.

name: Black Coral
text: Doesn't give a wash ticket. Uses only a pressure washer **(Calls it a steamer) **and leaves the tank wet.  Refuses to generate one and doesn't answer or return your call.  Very very unprofessional.. DO NOT USE HIS SERVICES IF YOU NEED A CLEAN TANK...

resp.text: Hey Coral, sorry to see your low rating.  Every wash, whether it's trailer, clean out or a simple car wash gets a handwritten receipt.  Just a tidbit for yourself - the washer we use is an industrial steam pressure washer.  Oddly, I never received a voice message from you.  Unsure if you dial the wrong number - but you can reach me anytime during business hours at 334-724-9415.  Hopefully one day we will service you .

They guys working were great but something isn't right my car looks horrible. Was getting ready to put it up for sale but now have to figure this out

He is an excellent employee and gave more than 100% on his job tonight. Very impressed!  Thank you Roadrunner for choosing this young man to represent your business !!

I gave it a 2 only because, this place kinda makes a habit of opening late. It says 8:30, but I’m here now at 9:10,  for the last 15 minutes. It’s still not open. I understand it hires young kids, but one’s best ability, is their AVAILABILITY.

Punctuality in the service industry is kinda important

text: After purchasing our wash we sat in line behind the driver of a truck for over 15 minutes before we even entered the wash. He apparently was friends with the kid working and got out and proceeded to detail and scrub his truck with the employee helping. Very unprofessional rude for all parties involved. Needless to say the quick drive through car wash took almost 20 minutes.

text: On the website the open time is 8am they don’t open till 8:30am  The vacuums do not vacuum as good as they did. When I inquired about the time with worker he tolde that was the Andalusia area and I explained to him it shows 8am for the Brewton location he got a little smart.

text: The one thing that really bothered me was the smell. The inside smelled like a soured mop and make my vechile smell that way to. Way too expensive for a mediocre job.

text: This place is horrible. The kids or whatever you have to wash some of the dirt off of the wheels or windows before you go in, act like it is a bother for them to do their job. I came out of the car wash with my wheels looking just as bad as they did when I went in. When they try to direct you onto the track, they treat you like you're stupid. They try to rush yiu, I'm sorry I want to make sure I am on there the correct way. Maybe you should find some other young people that take pride in their job even if it is just at a carwash. My nephew used to Work at a place just like this and he made sure the job was done correctly and he was friendly. One last thing $6 for the cheapest wash but then it jumps to $9 and higher. That is just too much if you ask me. I know people will just say "wash your own car then" well, I work late hours sometimes and I don't always have a whole lot of time, but I will find the time from now on.

name: Marvin Mohler
text:
I have used Alabama Auto Clean for a number of years for all of my personal vehicles as well as family member's vehicles. In addition I am the treasurer of a local credit union and we have used Alabama Auto Clean when we needed to sell a repossessed vehicle. They always do an amazing job cleaning the vehicles and I have always been happy with the services they provide. Unfortunately when I recently had my Yukon XL detailed I left the trailer hitch cover and another item in the third row seat. Again they did a great job with the detailing but the items that were left in the car were missing when it was delivered back to me. I am not sure if Ricky is still there but I wasn't able to talk to him at any point during this visit. It is a shame that someone would take items from the vehicles they are responsible for but when I asked about the missing items I was told they were not there. Just the hitch cover is $115 plus the body shop cost to paint to match the Yukon. I am sure I can find another detail shop that is honest and does as good of a job.

This issue was resolved - Ricky saw my review and, as I expected he would, corrected the situation. Since they do remove everything from your vehicle prior to detailing I would recommend not leaving anything inside. There is always a possibility that something can get lost or misplaced.
Thank you Ricky

name: Jane Frink
text:
Booked an appointment to have my car detailed ($200 detail package) and received text and email confirmation of my appointment. It had lightly rained early in the morning and was overcast but hadn't rained for hours. I didn't receive any notification that the car wash was closed so I called the phone number included in the text confirmation to confirm it was open; no answer ringing was followed by a message indicating no voice mail box had been set up. The message didn't even indicate it was for the car wash so I checked the number on the website and dialed again - same result; no answer, no voice mail box. Without confirmation that the car wash was closed and no cancellation notice received, I drove 20 minutes to get to my appointment on time (12:00 noon) only to find that the facility was shut down and dark. The restaurant inside the building was open and the gentleman there advised the car wash was indeed closed. He offered to make a call to see if he could find out about my appointment, but no one answered his call either. I understand that car washes close in inclement weather and I would have gladly rebooked my appointment for another day. But to close and not notify patrons who have scheduled an appointment is unconcionable and bad business practice. With so many other car wash options in the area, they should do a better job to try to keep their clientele. I will still have my car detailed, just not at this car wash. If I can't trust them to send a cancellation, I'm sure not going to trust them with my car.

Update: just received a text and an email confirming a new detailing appointment for next week. Thing is, I didn't reschedule. Awfully presumptuous to assume 1. that I want to reschedule, and 2. that the day and time rescheduled would even work for me.

resp.text: we are trying to get hold of online appointment  system..... please e mail us at riverchasecarwash786@gmail.com to reschedule as per your availability or call us at 205-566-6730 to redeem the special discount on full interior detail

text: It took me a couple days to write this review because I want to make sure I didn't say ignorant things... that's how mad they made me as I was sitting in the lobby I watched my car pull out and and the young lady is sitting in leaning driving my car with one hand like she owns it I was so focused on that I didn't notice that the cover to my mirror driver side was off 2015 Chevy Malibu LTZ I was even recording it cuz I kind of thought it was funny but as I'm paying more attention I noticed when she pulls up she hops out looks around and from behind her back I see her pull out my cover and pop it back on it did go back on with no problem I sat and watched and wondered if she was going to tell me and she pulls up I walk outside and she was a literally about to let me get in my seat and pull off before I said so you're not going to tell me about my mirror ask for a manager I was brushed off to it's their policy that the mirrors don't fold in it's nothing they would do about it so for me being out of town I decided not to make a big case and I unhappily moved on I was assured that top top management would do absolutely nothing about it

After a 24 hour road trip, food and trash from a 10 year old and dried milk stains on leather seats and in carpet from 2 year old, Riverchase had my SUV looking better than it did when I purchased it earlier this year, including the hard to reach 3rd row that only the 10 year old can get to.

Ask for Curtis!

resp.text: Thanks for kind words Kahlil

resp.text: Sorry to hear that you are not satisfied can you come back and let us satisfy you.... also this is our practice that we always ask customer before leaving if they are satisfied.... and make sure every customer is satisfied before leaving specially the interior detail customers....if due to weather you feel we rushed and my staff forgot to ask you before leaving or left something .... please come back so we can satisfy you

text: These guys do a very very good job at making my car look beautiful! However, I think everyone here needs to work on their customer service. text:
Slow is not the word for it. There were 3 cars getting worked on mine included. The everyone disappears. No one is working on anythine.
I waited 15 minutes and someone started cleaning the glass. One they got started they did a good job, but come on, let's so a little urgency about your job.

resp.text: Hi Darryl, we apologize for the delay yesterday. Could you email me at info@riverchasecarwash.com? I would like to make it up to you.

name: John McMillan
text: Professional and fast

name: Allie Taylor
text:
Hate to leave a bad review, but maybe it will help improve service. I arrived and paid at 4:45, and was through the automated car wash and in line at the full service lane within 10 minutes, with one car in front of me. It was a full hour before my car made it up to the station to be cleaned. The length of time doesn’t bother me so much as the fact that the lanes were moving at very different speeds. This meant 6 people who arrived after me (one an hour after I did) still got their cars finished first. I understand that the lanes cannot move at the same speed, as not every car takes the same amount of time to clean, but it was very frustrating to watch so many people arrive and leave before my car was even started. I’d highly recommend keeping the cars in a single file line so they can move forward as spots open up rather than trapping them in a lane that isn’t moving. I will potentially give this place another chance, but will definitely be requesting the left lane if I do so! Additionally, it would be great if you could place an ATM inside. Before I became dissatisfied with the service, I walked to the nearby gas station to try to get cash to tip and the ATM was out of order. That’s my fault for not thinking ahead, but I’m sure there are other people who would like to tip but who don’t have cash, and I’m sure the employees would appreciate it.

Update: Great customer service—was contacted directly and feel like they took my feedback seriously. Will try to swing by to give it another shot sometime soon.

resp.text: Update: We got ATM now! :)

name: joe miele
text: Been hear almost hour and they haven't started us. And the place is dead.  The kids cleaning are too busy talking and not doing their jobs.

resp.text: Sorry about the wait. Please let us know if you were satisfied with clean car or not.... also come visit us again this week to enjoy free wash and turn u on to happy customer

text: I've been coming here for 2 years. They do an amazing job every single time. Friendly workers, quick service and a car that I almost don't  recognize when I go outside. Love it and won't go elsewhere!

name: Amy L
text: Literally just left, paid for the “works” on two cars after reading reviews. My car looks the exact same it did when I came in. When we got to the internal cleaning I had time to walk inside and sit down before they immediately called me back to say one car was finished. I paid $39 for a drive through car wash and less than five minutes of it being “vacuumed”. My dashboard still has dust/sander and my tires still have black brake dust dust on them.  I won’t be back.

resp.text: Hi Amy - Could you email us? info@riverchasecarwash.com - I would like to get more details and make sure we make it right. Thanks.

text: I wanted to edit my last review. I was not pleased with the original job they did. I let management know and they had me bring my car back a week later. They did do a very nice job the second time around. I appreciate them making it right.

text: The worst service ever.. everytime i wash my car there they make it more dirty from the inside  i just cancel my membership with them and the owners never care like ok we gonna cancel it for you like they don't care and never ask why i wanna cancel it .. plus i got $11 stolen from my car

resp.text: Hi Ali Mahmond, thanks for your review. You found your $11.00 IN BETWEEN THE SEATS of your car while you were on the phone with the police. Our staff has already shared your recent visit and shared that you called our staff thieves and made rude comments. It would've been nice if you apologized to the staff for your mishaps. Due to this reason, we did not ask why or how we can please you further. Most of our VIP members has been with us more than 3 - 5 years now. We treat our customers like family, but please be kind. This is a small business with many staff members that has been here quite some time. You are more than welcome to speak to us in person if you want to share any further comments.

You have an option to buy Full-Service/In & Out Cleaning car washes on Groupon for you to get interior cleaning! Your $8 car wash groupon was just for exterior cleaning. Thanks!

name: Jennifer Lewis
text: I recently bought a 2014 Mercedes-Benz CLA250 and wanted to make sure my car looked great. Blue Crystal wax looks so beautiful on my car! So shiny & pretty! I am so tired of vacuuming my own car at other car washes but I like it here. I'll be back!

name: Lindsey Johnston
text: I paid for the "Works in-and-out With trunk vacuum and hot wax"  The staff was friendly and the service was fast but there are a few problems. The nooks and crannies were still pretty dusty, as was the right side of the car on the dash. One place on the dash right above the glove bax still had whatever cleaning spray on it where it wasn't even wiped over. The  trunk was left untouched as well. The people are pretty nice, but the detailing could be better. I'm not looking for compensation or anything, I just want to let these things be knows so people can improve and grow.

resp.text: Hi Lindsey, thank you for your feedback. We will share the details with the team that has worked on your vehicle yesterday. They are aware and will work on the little details that you have mentioned. Could you e-mail us? We would love to get an opportunity to make it right the next time you need a car wash. Our e-mail address is info@riverchasecarwash.com - thank you.

name: Helen Pruet
text:
Great customer service. But if you are looking for the deli - it is gone. Stop by at the many close fast food & quick food locations & eat while you wait. The outside seating area was clean & enjoyable on this beautiful spring day. I was in & out in 35 minutes
with the works package - that was from 2-3 on a Tuesday.

resp.text: Hi Helen, Thank you for your thorough feedback. Don't forget - we offer 7-day rain check! :) See you soon!

name: Betty Hawkshead
text: Awesome attention to my car! Looked like almost new when they finished. Very reasonable rates!

resp.text: Hope to see you soon, Betty! ❤️

name: Stephanie Cannada
text: Awesome wash in and out!

resp.text: Thanks Stephanie. We appreciate your business and support.

name: Susan McKinney
text:
It was ok. I've had an interior detail from other places before, and this place is mediocre for the price you pay.  I get a little picky when I have to pay almost $200 for something, as this is a major splurge for me that I do only once a year, if that.  However, the staff was really friendly. When I pulled up, they asked what I was most worried about.  I said the dirt and getting my seats and carpets shampooed.  I said I would get the dog hair later.  I probably should have been clearer, as I didn't want to pay the extra 20+ for the dog hair cleaning.  They inspected the car and charged me for the dog hair (about 30 bucks).  I went ahead and paid as I was there and thought, might as well let them get the dog hair if I'm going to pay for it.  When I got the car back, there was still quite a bit of hair in the floor board and mats. I'm going to have to go in and remove it, which is what I had planned to do, but still got charged for it.  With all that to say, they still did a great job cleaning the dash, doors, and seats. It smelled much much better too. However, the windows, when rolled down, still had all of the grime at the top. I was kinda bummed, as this is one of the small things I was looking forward to having cleaned.  I can clean it easily, but again, it was part of a splurge that I was hoping would take care of it.
This is where I'm gonna sound real nit picky, but the presentation could have been a little better. Every place I've ever gotten an interior detail from (that I paid less for), they presented the car to me and did something of a walk through with me. If there was some dirt, spots, or stray hairs, they took care of it on the spot.  They didn't do this. There was still a little dirt in the floor board of the driver's side from where they were in and out of the car to move it and a couple of places that I would have liked to ask about. The back mats just looked kind of tossed in. Usually, the mats are placed in the trunk so the floorboards can dry, so it did take longer for my car to dry than it has before.
I would recommend it with an "eh" and shoulder shrug, but I probably won't be back.

name: Jones Cole
text: I took my car in a couple days ago for a basic inside/outside cleaning and was very pleased with the job they did. As a Birthday present, I had my wife Jeep washed and detailed there yesterday, including clay and wax. I was impressed; I don't think its shine and looked that good when it was brand new. Riverchase Car Wash & Detail was friendly and very helpful, and there was none of the high-pressure sales tactics that I've experienced elsewhere. It was clear that these folks honestly like to take good care of cars, and I'll be recommending them to friends.

name: Robert Lightfoot
text: Full service location , this car wash has been around for decades. They offer many car wash packages including a $7.00 exterior only wash. They have indoor waiting area for full service complete with Deli like foods. The car tunnel itself is extra long and does a decent job. Staff pre-sprays off vehicles before wash. Hand and air drying. Not a in and out type wash, can get very busy.

resp.text: Hi Robert! We really appreciate your detailed feedback- this will be very helpful for our new customers! :) We'll see you soon when the rain stops! Don't forget to follow us on Facebook for specials - www.facebook.com/riverchasecarwash

text: I'm planning on selling my car soon I wanted someone to clean it up so it's presentable and they did a really good job for $40 I've had this car since I was 13 and I'm 21 now this is really the first time it's been cleaned up like this and it actually looks great and it only took them about an hour I think when I get home it might take me another 30 minutes to hit some little spots they missed but since it was only $40 I think they did a really good job I wasn't expecting perfect but they did definitely try and they cared about making sure I was happy with the car the outside of my car I'd say 10 out of 10 in the inside like 7 out of 10

text: Excellent work cleaning the interior and exterior of my car, at an especially competitive price. I appreciated that they had a play area for my toddler while I waited.  They were also able to quote some scratch and paint fixes, which I wasn't expecting would be something that they could do. Finally, their customer service was wonderful – everyone was very respectful and kind!

resp.text: Thanks Rebekah :) We love seeing you and your baby! You guys are always so sweet and kind. Come see us again soon. We recently upgraded our tunnel and the whole car wash system. Give us a feedback before you leave the car wash on how we can improve! :)

name: Greg Nash
text: I have used Riverchase Car was previously, this is my second time with an older vehicle.  I've had a couple issues. 1.  Trim on the window was broken. was told by the Manager that he'd discuss with the owner and call me back.  I called back about an hour later after I noticed that my cup holder inserts were now missing.  Luckily they did have these, had to return to pickup.  Was told there was nothing they could do for the broken trim piece, that they only use brushes to lightly brush the dash and trim.  She tired to tell me that they didn't even touch that trim piece, I questioned then how did you clean it?  She stated there was nothing they could do about an older vehicle trim breaking, that anyone could have touched it tomorrow and broken it.  She offered to give me the number to a repair shop an my expense.  Needless to say, I will not be returning or referring anyone here again.

name: Kelsey
text: There are newer places that charge less. I came for a detail only to find the Groupon titled car wash and detail didn't include the detail. I paid even more for the car detail! I'll continue to use the newer more automated carwashes around town. My car hasn't been detailed since purchase and that's what I really desired. Save yourself these hassle unless you want the detail that the newer carwashes don't do.

resp.text:
Hi Kelsey! It seems like there was a confusion. Detail has multiple meanings... it can be for Wax, Coating, Polishing, Buffing, Headlight Restoration, Leather Cleaning, Shampooing or Complete Interior Detail, etc.
***Groupon's "DETAIL" is for LA Wax Club's Wax & Shine or Blue Crystal Coating.
***Groupon's "CAR WASH" is for Exterior Wash or Works In & Out Wash.

I hope you realize that we offer multiple different options and our intention is not to be a hassle but to meet all car cleaning needs. Our car wash gotten a new car wash tunnel so I hope you try out us again sometime. 🥰

text: Wonderful experience! They do the best job in birmingham. I have tried Anthony's and several others and they are the best. The groupons for this place are amazing as well. The first time they washed and detailed my car it looked better than when it was on the showroom floor. There is a wait when you go as is to be expected.

resp.text: This is so great to hear! Just to let you know- we have a new groupon deal out as of today! Check it out! :) We'll see you soon, Sarah!

name: Freelance Comli
text: I recently visited this location for a coating. It was their new wax coating and it was on sale! My car looks UNBELIEVABLE . It's never been this shiny before since I bought it brand new. Very satisfied with my detail. Thank you!!!

text: So I came back from a week long vacation to find out that I had left a back window down on my new car. Instead of charging me for a full interior detail and taking advantage of the situation by giving me more than I really needed. They gave me something that was cheaper and made my car like new again! name: L K
text: So.... just don't even leave your car here. i left them with a perfectly working Volvo, and in return i received a dead one. My car is at the dealership now awaiting diagnostics, but the mechanic assumes water damage to my central electric system. they insisted they didn't spray anything inside the car but it was soaking wet. they admitted they know nothing about cars after the fact, but nobody with a brain would spray things on electrical stuff. Nobody even offered to refund the $200 i spent on a detail, they just closed up and left. My car was clean and smelled great, but it won't turn on so that means nothing. I obviously will edit this review if they decide to fix what they messed up, but for now i wanted to warn people about what could happen to your car.

There were some red stains on the carpet that I knew it wasn't going to come out and the guy told me that beforehand so I understood. Great customer service. Overall great experience.

name: Daniel Dozier
text:
First of all I'm not one to complain but after paying 65 bucks for a "hand wash" inside and out I ended up having to take the detail rag away from the people and wipe my interior out myself. I ended up walking the manager and 2 of the detailers around my truck 3 times showing them missed spots. My wheels were half washed my floor mats didnt get vacuumed out or anything absolute worst car wash ever. Save your money and drive through the gas station car wash for 7 bucks it will be just as clean.
I asked for the owner but I was quickly informed " he ain't here" Anthony's charges 50 for a hand wash and done a better job needless to say riverchase got my first and last dollar. I wont be back

resp.text: Hi Daniel, we apologize for your recent visit. Please send us an e-mail, I would like to personally make it up for your recent hand wash visit and make sure it is properly cleaned. My e-mail is info@riverchasecarwash.com - thank you.

resp.text: Oh John, I don't think it's a scam when the car wash has to close due to tunnel maintenance and extreme weather conditions. We want to stay open as long as we can for whatever reason but some things are out of our hands. If your vouchers are expired due to these unfortunate circumstances, please e-mail us so we can still honor them. Thanks!

text: I honestly don't know much about cars so I used to go to an express wash (currently closed for some reason), but I noticed that my car was still dirty and had many light scratches. I left as a happy customer, because of 2 reasons: (1.) they took their time to make sure my car looked good!, and (2.) they gave me a discount for scratch repairs and you can't even see them! Thank you & I'll be back!

text: I recently got a full detail because the previous car owner was a smoker. Decent price. Staff was very accommodating, which I appreciated since I brought 3 kids with me. Free coffee and wi-fi was a bonus. Will be back.

name: rontanner159
text:
First, let me say that I don’t like writing these types of letters, but I am TOTALLY UPSET with Riverchase Car Wash!  I am a FREQUENT long time user of Riverchase Car Wash and have a PREFERRED CUSTOMER CARD noting multiple visits.

On Friday, March 31, 2017, I took my wife’s 2006 Lincoln Zephyr to be washed, detailed, and prepared for use the following week.  Normally, when I come to Riverchase, I get the standard car wash ($19.99).  No problems.   However, for my wife that day, I decided to upgrade my car wash to the $26.99 deal. (made it a little more special for my wife).
Upon receipt of my car, I noticed that part of one of the primary knobs (power knob) for my radio system had been damaged.  I immediately brought this to Riverchase Car Wash’s attention.  Riverchase Car Wash personnel attempted to repair the radio knob.  However, after 24 hours, I determined that the repair was not satisfactory.  The radio knob was still not available for normal use.  I promptly notified Riverchase Car Wash  management.  They stated that they would be notifying senior management for a resolution.

After a few days, I followed up with Riverchase.  They stated that senior management would NOT resolve the issue because they did not believe that Riverchase Car Wash caused the damage.

OK, I have NO REASON TO LIE!!!!!!!  FAIR IS FAIR!!!  This is a 2006 Lincoln Zephyr, TAKEN CARE OF VERY VERY WELL.  There would be NO LOGICAL REASON for this type damage to happen.  After review by radio experts, it was determined that the detailing service caused the damage to the vehicle.

Honestly, in my opinion, this is nothing more than POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE on the part of Riverchase Car Wash Management.  Taking care of your customers should be a CARDINAL RULE. (Particularly regular customers)  Fair, HONEST business should be key.

Believe me, I will make it my business to tell all my family members, friends, and work colleagues to NOT use Riverchase Car Wash for any car care services.  I will send them to Anthony’s Car Wash or other customer focused establishment instead.   You just LOST me and a lot of future customers.

I have respectfully requested a refund for the car wash and repairs(which was barely $120) with no response from Riverchase Car Wash!

name: David Gall
text: Purchased a coupon from Amazon for a windshield chip repair and stopped by their establishment today to redeem.  They were VERY hesitant to honor the purchased coupon even though it was prepaid.  The new owners spoke in their "native tongue" briefly then told me they needed to charge an extra $15.00 because the chip was "larger than a quarter".  I pulled a quarter out of my pocket and laid it on the windshield clearly showing the owner that the quarter completely covered the chip.  When he saw this, his reply was " just telling you how it is going to be"....basically he was saying tough sh_ _, you have to pay extra because I said so.  I've been an entrepreneur in Birmingham for over 40 years and I assure these people are unscrupulous and you should STEER CLEAR.  I wouldn't go back if their services were free and I suspect any positive reviews of this place are phony, too.

name: Tangeer Mehedi
text: Probably the only full service car wash that is left in Birmingham. Be sure to come either early or late in the afternoon to get in and out quick.

name: Aaron Caspar
text:
Awesome service! Friendly and professional. Needed a full interior detail done on my two door 2010 VW and I needed it done quick. I called and got an appointment for two days later. Gave them my keys outside to a nice young man and it was done about 2 hours later. Free wi-fi was convenient since I had some work to do while waiting. Free coffee inside and free drinks inside.
It looks completely brand new now :) Thanks guys! Absolutely recommend.

name: Madhava P
text: I paid for the works and my dash was not dusted, not sure if the works include that but I'm expecting a 44 dollar car wash to atleast  include that

resp.text: Hi Bum Bee! Yes - Works definitely includes dashboard. Our super-sonic cleaners get the dust off easily and quickly. If you feel as it is not done properly, please stop by anytime and we can fix that for you. Thanks for letting us know and please don't hesitate to ask for assistance before you leave the car wash so we can assist you quicker!

text: Horrible job. Price came out to more than $20 over what I was told on the phone, and the lady pocketed my tip for the detailer, saying "now I'm not gun' be da actual person to do your car so when dey bring it out you gon need to tip them again." Then SHE brought my car out hoping I wouldn't notice it was the same person since it took OVER AN HOUR. To top it all off, they did a horrible job. Car not clean inside OR out. If I asked a high school kid to clean my car and it showed up like this I'd laugh in their face and tell them try again. However this is not $20 to a high school kid with a bucket of water soap and a cloth, this is SEVENTY DOLLARS spent at what USED TO BE a prominent car care center in the HUB of the Birmingham social center that is Riverchase! If I can't expect this place to do a good job I suppose I'll have to do it myself. And no I didn't ask for a refund, I'm not one of "those" people. EDIT: After getting chewed out by my boss when this 30 min car wash became an hour and half ordeal running me late for work, yes I did get a refund.

name: Charles Grubbs
text: Good car wash experience. Can't beat the $25 wash."

name: TaDarius Hooper
text:
On Feb. 28th, 2014, my fiance` and I both had our cars washed at your establishment.  We have been coming there for over the last two years and until this visit we were adequately satisfied.
My car has a flip out screen radio which was closed when I arrived.  On this occasion I noticed once I got back in my car that what I was listening to had been changed.  I also have a USB drive with a playlist plugged into it.  All of this is important because that means that whomever was in my car had to open the screen, look through my playlist to pick what THEY wanted to hear, and then close it again.  Turning it down or off would have been okay, but going through my stuff is NOT.
The bigger issue: I called the next day and asked to speak to a manager about the problem but she was not in.  So I told the lady on the phone my problem and left my name and number for the manager to call me back.  About a week later I called again and left another message.  A few days ago I called and left yet another message.  I have yet to receive a call back.  Bad business practice and customer service.  So until management at least acts like they care about their clients I will take my $25 - $75 a month elsewhere.

name: V Patel
text: No issues. Purchased the $50 Groupon for a basic wax, and upgraded to the 3-compound buff/wax they offer for an additional $100. They didn't try to upsell it to me, I simply requested it and hoped they'd let me pay the difference. Waiting room and bathroom was clean, had decent wi-fi, air conditioned, no issues. Some free coffee/water would've been nice, but whatever. I waited a couple hours for the buff/wax to be done. Car looked fantastic afterwards, really much better than I had expected. Overall, quite happy.

text: Poor management and customer service! Low end car wash products washed my dash in basicly windex. They called the police on customers 2 time in 45 mins I was there needless to say want go back ever

text:
I decided to try this place out because I had puchased a Groupon. When I arrived the people seemed very friendly. Their pricing structure was very difficult to understand with an extra charge for everything. I usually wash my car at Goo Goo which is truly awesome and I would very highly reccommend and only $6, however I tried this place out for the wax package. After they had finished they showed me to my car and I opened the passenger side door I noticed the seat was wet. The guy said they ran it through the wash with the window cracked. When I pulled up both my windows were completly down, because I didn't want my keys locked in the car. They didn't really seem to care that they soaked the seat of my brand new car.
I'm worried to go back to use my 2nd Groupon.

name: Kc Fischer
text:
These guys are terrible. I had my car washed and the interior cleaned, but it would have been cleaner if I had let my two year-old daughter "clean" it.

There were water spots on the exterior and streaks on the chrome where they sort-of towel dried it, and the interior "detail" was really just a guy with a rag who did a once-over wipe-down without paying any attention to what he was doing. I got my cleaning stuff out when I got home and polished the streaks off of the radio and the instrument panel so they didn't look so bad.

As I was pulling out of the parking lot, I noticed that the rear windows had smears and hand prints on them. I had to point out to one of them that they did not even attempt to clean the rear windows, and they had the nerve to ask for another tip after they cleaned them for me.

BEWARE: When they sell you a "detail" cleaning, what they mean is that they will skip all the details.

text: Been going here for a number of years, and recently management changed. First time something went missing it was a bottle of Chanel perfume....I just figure I misplaced it somewhere. Second time it was a really nice red car charger, that vanished from my car after I went to get my car done. So last Thursday I said...I've got to see if these guys are honest or a bunch of dishonest scrubs. I placed a 5.00 bill under my drivers seat, Needless to say it was gone when I got back in my car. I will never be back!!! I hope the owners know the people he has Working for him are dishonest.....

name: Cory Janeway
text:
Ive been using this car wash for a while and I have loved it until today. Their sign at the end is broken and continuously says wait. Most people pick up on the fact that it's broken. They loaded 4 cars into the car wash back to back. The elderly gentleman up front did not pick up on the fact of the sign being broken. And was stopped at the exit as the tracked were pushing me forward. I had to hold on my brakes while blowing my horn repeatedly for him to move and it still took him too long to move I believe he may have been hearing impaired at no fault of his own
I'm pretty sure the vehicle behind me had to use their brakes also. Stopping in car washes can mess up your paint and tires. I'm lucky that mine wasn't messed up. However, they should either put up something over that sign saying it's broken. And/or tell people before they go in that it's broken. And not put people in there back to back. Also... I was blowing my horn repeatedly while in there and it's like no one that worked there noticed. If they had been paying attention maybe they could have hit a stop button. They do get your car squeaky clean. But remember that sign is broken.

name: Chris Chapman

Nice car wash.  The service isn't real good the employees seem to be lacking common sense or are just lazy.  The vacuum s never work or are always closed off on e side causing it to be crowded.

name: Christopher Oconnor
text:
This is the worst way I have been treated as a customer from ANY business from as long as i can remember. If you want to feel like a valued customer and not be treated like a thief and have your integrity attacked, I strongly advise you t spend your money elsewhere. There are plenty of other car washes in Tuscaloosa. If this is the last car wash left on earth i think its best to never wash your car again than to deal with these people.  Let me explain...

I purchased the daily unlimited plan from Overflow during summer 2020. I dont really wash my car so often but with the pandemic i did not want to keep using my card in the machine or dealing with workers. A staff member came out and put a sticker in my car. He did not do a very good job at placing the sticker and it was not flush on the windscreen. I did not think this was a big deal since if it was then i would think the employee would replace it with a new sticker there and then.

Fast forward a few weeks later and thats when pestering from the Overflow workers began. One specific female worker kept accusing me of removing the sticker from my car. I tried to explain that the sticker has never touched since the day it was put on and she refused to believe me. I told her to change the sticker to a proper one, but she didnt.

Recently, in the last days of September 2020, a new person started pestering me and that gentleman told me he was the owner.  He told me that "5000" vehicles have stickers from his company and none looks like mine so i must have taken it off to give my friends. Basically, he was questioning my integrity and accusing me of being a thief. I am a PhD student and instructor at UA, and so as an upcoming researcher integrity is super important to me and i got annoyed with the constant questioning of my integrity. I have never been accused of stealing anything in my life so i was very upset over this. I would never compromise my integrity, especially in the way they are accusing me.

The owner now told me that he could finally change the sticker or give me a refund and cancel my membership; I told him to change the sticker. When he came out with a new sticker he told me that if the new sticker starts to look crumpled after he puts it on then that means i am tampering with it and he would cancel my plan instantly. This then sounds to me like a set up. Clearly he still believes that i am tampering with the sticker and is setting me up to prove him right if the sticker looks misaligned in some way in the future. Anything can happen in the future; a pet or some object could come in contact with the sticker and make it misaligned in the future, and while that probability is very low it is non-zero. I did not want to give these people any opportunity to disparage my integrity further so thats when i told the owner i changed my mind and told him to give me a refund. He went to do it like it was nothing, like i was never a valued customer in the first place. Like i was begging this company for their services and not paying my hard earned money for it. No-one has ever touched that sticker, so their accusations and lack of reconciliation is sad.

name: C Hill
text: I was disappointed that there weren't enough spaces for people in the self serve areas (both the vacuums and the bug wash) and was also deeply disappointed that they don't offer undercarriage washes after all the snow we just had.

resp.text:
We hate to hear that your experience didn't meet your expectations. If you're finding that space is limited, we'd recommend coming between the hours of 8am-9am or 7pm-8pm. These times a little less hectic for our visitors, and we trust you'll find the space you're looking for!
We appreciate your concern when it comes to the undercarriage wash, and we'll take that into consideration moving forward!

name: Jennifer Barron
text:
So I had my car washed and did not have time to vacuum it. As everyone knows you get a free vacuum with each car wash. No problem said the sweet guy working there just needed to show my receipt when I came back and I could vacuum it then. Awfully kind of him to offer since he certainly didn't have to!

I do wish they would come down a little on their pricing but the car wash does a great job considering it's not me washing the car!

name: Sar Jim
text: They do a good job for an automatic car was. A few dollars extra will get a good preclean of your car. the wash and wax does a good job, and the vacuums will suck your toe off. Plenty of room to get the inside of the car clean and not get in anyone's way. Considering it's the only one in town, they don't act like it.

name: Olivia Kelly
text: Came thought here to kill some time on a road trip it was pretty cool. Didn't particularly clean my car but it was actually dirty and not just dusty so I'll take what I can get out of that.

name: Richard Michael W
text:
Love locally owned businesses that also do a great job. Finding this place in a small town like Eufaula (I think this is still Eufaula) is like finding a gold needle in a hayfield.
My Ford Escape looked and smelled great and their guys took the time to remove all the bugs.
I def see why they're busy

name: Bee “BuhLokKay” Davys
text: I guess they were closed for service on a Thursday afternoon around 1:45-2 pm but there was not a sign or notification alerting customers to not waste their time driving in. Obligated to leave a tip via the obvious sign (when not closed for service) when I haven’t even asked for a small pre-wash by employees who just assume that I want it or are instructed by manager to do so. Other than this, which are barely complaints, it’s a pretty good car wash. Haha.
